GSP33mbrahsiu:11: parāṃ ca devatāṃ guṇābhidhānalakṣaṇayā stutyā kāyavāṅmanaḥprahvatālakṣaṇayā ca praṇatyā pūjayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:16: rāganibandhanā ca pravṛttiḥ saṃsārabījamiti na muktaye syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:19: tasmātsakaladuḥkhātige brahmatattve duḥkhebhya udvignaḥ sukhebhyaśca vītarāgaḥ pravartamāno mucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:23: na cāśmādau prasaṅgaḥ, pratyagvṛtterupalabhyamānāyāḥ sukhatvāt, tadviśiṣṭātmopalabdhervā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:31: yatrāpi duḥkhavigamaḥ, tatrāpi na tanmātrameva sukham, annapānaviśeṣopādānāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:33: na ca sa viśeṣavān, yena tadviśeṣāya tatsādhanaviśeṣo 'pekṣyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:36: yadāpi nānyadduḥkhaṃ nivartyam, tadāpi kāmasya duḥkhātmakatvāttannibarhaṇarūpaṃ sukham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:40: yatraiva kāmaḥ sa eva sukhayati viṣayaḥ, netaraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:42: anyathā ya ekasya sukhaḥ sa sarvasya syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:43: kāmanivṛttyā tu sukhatve yatra yasya kāmo 'bhiruciḥ sa eva tasya sukha iti yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:46: uktaṃ hi ‘na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:47: tathā ‘bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ, kauśalāni cendriyāṇām'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:48: viṣayadoṣadarśanādapi ca kāmanivṛttiḥ, tatropabhogatulya āhlādaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:49: samāne ca prārthitārthalābhe pramodabhedo na syāt, kāmanivṛtteraviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:53: kāmātirekātprayasyantamavāpto 'rtho na tathā prīṇayati, yathāprārthito vinā prayāsādupanataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:55: kleśādavāpto 'yamiti na tena tathā prīyate, yathānāśaṃsitopanatena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:56: kāmābhāvamātre ca sukhe 'kāmitaviṣayopabhoge na bhogāvasthāyāḥ pūrvāpare avasthe bhidyeyātām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:58: bhogāvasthāyāṃ prabuddhādhvastakāma eveti cetpūrvā [KKS_3] parayorapi dvayoravasthayostarhi sukhī itaratra duḥkhītyanubhavaviruddhamāpadyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:59: aprāptaśca smaraṇaviparivartī viṣayaḥ kāmasyodbodhakaḥ, prāpto nivartakaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:61: na ca yatra kāmastatra sukham, manorathaśatārthitasyāpyupabhogena kasyacidduḥkhitvadarśanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:63: yāpi kācidananubhūte 'pi jātiviśeṣabhājāṃ kāmapravṛttiḥ sāpi prāgbhavīyānubhavanibandhanā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:64: yathā ca kasyacitkvacitkāmo jātibhedādinimittaḥ, tathā kiñcitkasyacitsukhamiti nāvyavasthā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:65: api ca kāmanivṛttyāpi keciddūyante, tadabhāve viṣayopabhogasāmarthyābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:68: kimiti tarhi dūyante? anubhūtacarasya tajjanmanaḥ sukhasyāprāpteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:69: yathā pittādyupahatendriyā viśiṣṭebhyo 'nnapānebhyo nivṛttikāmāḥ, tathaiva kāmanivṛttyā tapyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:79: tattvadarśanavaimalyāttu tattve cetasaḥ prasādo 'bhirucirabhīcchā na rāgapakṣe vyavasthāpyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:81: anyathā sarvaduḥkhātige 'pi tattve taddveṣanibandhanā pravṛttiriti saṃsārānubandhaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:82: api ca dṛṣṭaparotkarṣarāgibhyo 'pīndriyajaya upadiśyate sādhanatvena kāmādityāgātmakaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:90: kartṛkarmabhāvaśca na kriyāṃ karaṇaṃ cāntareṇa yataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:91: tataḥ ‘ānandaṃ brahma'; [KKS_4] iti ca na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:94: puruṣārthatvāya hi tatsaṃkīrtanam, asaṃvedyaśca kathaṃ puruṣārthaḥ? ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:97: pramāṇasya phalamarthāntaramanarthāntaraṃ vā sarvaparīkṣakaiḥ pratijñāyate prajñāyate ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:104: yathā ca kartaryātmanyasaṃvedye saṃvideva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:108: na hyātmāsaṃvedyaḥ phale viṣaye cānusaṃdhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:110: na ca saṃvedyaḥ, karmatve karturvyatirekaprasaṅgāt anātmatvaprasaṅgācca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:112: tathā brahmaṇaḥ svātmaprakāśasyānandasvabhāvo na saṃvedyaḥ, karmatvābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:115: tathā hi sarvakarmapratyastamayahetuka eva sa ucyate ‘yadāsya sarvamātmaivābhūt'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:121: na hi bhedodayavyayānāṃ nivṛttiḥ kiñcidvastu, yena dvaitamāvahet /
GSP33mbrahsiu:122: ānandaśca yadi bhāvaḥ, tasya dharmitve vijñānaṃ dharmaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:124: na hyekasya dve rūpe yujyete, virodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:129: dharmo 'pi dharmiṇo na bhinnaḥ, bhede gavāśvavaddharmadharmibhāvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:137: kathaṃ cāparyāyaśabdābhidheya ekatvam? tasmādduḥkhoparama evānandaśabdasya brahmaṇyartha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:139: viśiṣṭasyāhlādātmanaḥ prakāśasya cāndramasasyeva śabdadvayena pratipādanānna doṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:144: atha ca eka evābhyāmarthaviśeṣaḥ pratipādyate prakāśaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:153: na hi svarūpataḥ paramatāsaṃbhave virodhyasaṃsargādupacaritā sā yuktā bhavitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:155: evaṃ ca laukikānanda etasya mātreti yujyate, avacchedāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:161: sarvasyeyamātmāśīḥ kṛmerapi ‘mā na bhūvam, bhūyāsam'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:165: anye tu suṣupte ‘sukhamahamasvāpsam'; iti parāmarśādātmani sukhānubhavamāhuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:166: na hyananubhave parāmarśa evaṃ syāt, suṣuptābhyupagamaśca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:173: anyathābhāve 'vagate duḥkhoparamanimittaḥ sukhaśabda iti yujyate, anyathā mukhyārthataiva yuktā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:186: ‘indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate'; iti vyaktameva nānārūpāvagamo māyānibandhano darśitaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:187: tatra kathamekatvamupacaritamiti vaktuṃ śakyam? tathā vyakto nānātvaniṣedhaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:193: ‘ya iha nāneva paśyati'; iti ivaśabdena prakāśito nopacarita ekatve 'vakalpate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:194: kāmamupacārādastvekatvam, na tu bhāvikasya nānātvasya nivṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:200: sā hi sādhyasādhanādivibhāgaṃ nivartayantī sarvatra cātmābhimānamāvirbhāvayantī tadvirodhinī syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:201: tathā hi sarvato nivṛttasya niḥśreyasamityavisaṃvādaḥ (corrected; api saṃvādaḥ -- edition) /
GSP33mbrahsiu:204: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati, yathā ‘aho darśanīyā, aho darśanīyā'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:210: ekasminnapyātmani sarvagate śarīraparimāṇe 'ṇuparimāṇe vā kalpitabhedanibandhanā bhogavyavasthā dṛśyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:211: pāde me vedanā, śirasi me vedanā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:213: na hi pādasya śiraso vā vedanayābhisaṃbandhaḥ, ajñatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:219: api ca tatrāpi na pradeśaḥ pradeśāntaravedanāmanusaṃdadhāti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:224: eko 'pyātmā pradeśaiḥ sukhaduḥkhādibhiryujyamānastatra baddha iva itaratra mukta iva ca gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:225: yathā malīmase darpaṇatale malīmasaṃ mukhaṃ viśuddhe viśuddhaṃ darpaṇarahitaṃ ca gamyamānaṃ tadupādhidoṣāsaṃpṛktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:227: kalpanā pratipattuḥ pratyayasya dharmo na vastu vyavasthāpayitumalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:228: na khalu pratipattuḥ pratyayamanu viparivartante vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:235: kalpito 'pi cāhidaṃśo maraṇakāryāya kalpate, pratisūryakaśca prakāśakāryāya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:247: ekāntaḥkaraṇasaṃkrāntāvastyeva sambandha iti cet, na, citeḥ śuddhatvādapariṇāmādapratisaṃkramācca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:248: dṛśyā buddhiścitisannidhestacchāyayā vivartata iti cet, atha keyaṃ tacchāyatā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:259: citestu vibhaktamasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ tayā cetyata iti duravagamam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:267: anādinidhanatve hi nāpaneyaṃ nopaneyaṃ vā kiñcidastīti tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo vyarthāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:275: na ca śāstrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam, avidyāyā nivartyatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:277: na brūmo 'nādernoccheda iti, kiṃ tu nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:278: [KKS_9] athāvidyā na brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ, arthāntaraṃ brahmaṇa āpadyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:279: na vā syāt, tatra kiṃ nivartyam? atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:285: na ca brahmaṇo 'nyo 'sti, yasya tattvāgrahaṇaṃ brahmaṇi prayatnalabhyayā vidyayā nivartyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:288: yasya tu viparyayagrahaṇamavidyā, tasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaścetsa nityaḥ kathaṃ nivartyeta?
GSP33mbrahsiu:291: brahmaṇa eveti cet, vipratiṣedhaḥ, tasya vidyāsvarūpatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:294: nāvidyā brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ, nārthāntaram, nātyantamasatī, nāpi satī /
GSP33mbrahsiu:296: svabhāvaścetkasyacit, anyo 'nanyo vā paramārtha eveti nāvidyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:309: avabhāsamānaṃ rūpaṃ mā bhūt, avabhāsastu sanneva, sa cāvidyeti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:318: evaṃ ca nādvaitahānam, na nivartanīyasyābhāvo vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:326: kasya punaḥ kalpanā bhedikā? na tāvad brahmaṇaḥ, tasya vidyātmanaḥ kalpanāśūnyatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:356: na hi māyākārasya vividhaṃ prapañcaṃ [KKS_11] darśayato 'ṅgasākalyavaikalyavibhāgena rāgadveṣavibhāgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:357: citrapustādikṛtāṃ vā vikalāvikalādibhedena citrāṇi tāni tāni kurvatām,
GSP33mbrahsiu:358: bālānāṃ ca mṛṇmayādibhiḥ pratikṛtibhedairvicitraiḥ krīḍatāṃ na teṣu kiñcidvaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:359: karmāśayānurodhena ca vidadhato vaicitryaṃ na doṣa ityācāryāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:366: tathācetanasya gomayasya cetano vṛścika ityādi bahuvidhaṃ prakṛtivikāravailakṣaṇyamutprekṣitavyamityalamatiprasaṅgena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:376: tathā ca ‘svapnādivadavidyāyāḥ pravṛttistasya kiṅkṛtā'; iti pratyuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:379: api ca pārthivānāmaṇūnāṃ śyāmatānādiḥ pākajena varṇena nivartyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:382: na khalvātmasvabhāva eva vidyā avidyānivartikā, avidyāyāstayā saha vṛtteravirodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:397: atha brahmaiva saṃsarati brahmaiva mucyate, ekamuktau sarvamuktiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:398: yato bhedadarśanena brahmaiva saṃsarati, abhedadarśanena ca mucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:403: avyatireke 'pi ca brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ bimbapratibimbavadvidyāvidyāvyavasthā vyākhyātā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:410: sa ca sāmānyena bhedadarśanaṃ pravilāpayannātmanāpi pravilīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:411: na ca śrotṛśravaṇaśrotavyādivibhāgaparihāṇyā vibhāgāntaranivṛttiviṣayāḥ śravaṇādayaḥ, api tu sāmānyena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:412: tathā ca tasminnapi pravilīne svacchaḥ pariśuddho 'syātmā prakāśate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:413: yathā rajaḥsamparkakaluṣitamudakaṃ dravyaviśeṣacūrṇarajaḥ prakṣiptaṃ rajontarāṇi saṃharatsvayamapi saṃhriyamāṇaṃ svacchāṃ svarūpāvasthāmupanayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:414: evameva śravaṇādibhirbhedadarśane pravilīyamāne viśeṣābhāvāttadgate ca bhede,
GSP33mbrahsiu:416: avidyayaiva tu brahmaṇo jīvo vibhaktaḥ, tannivṛttau brahmasvarūpameva bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:417: yathā ghaṭādibhede tadākāśaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paramākāśameva bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:419: kathaṃ bhedenaiva bhedaḥ pratisaṃhriyate? bhedapratipakṣatvāt, yathā rajasā rajaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:422: yathā payaḥ payo jarayati [KKS_13] svayaṃ ca jīryati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:423: yathā ca viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:430: sādhyā tarhi, tathā ca kṛtakatvādanityatvam, ata āha ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:445: ‘tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:449: tathā na vidyā aikātmyaśravaṇādilakṣaṇā vināvidyayā, śrotṛśravaṇādivibhāgānubaddhatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:450: tatrāvidyayaiva vidyāpratyāsannayā vibhāgadarśanamavidyāṃ tīrtvā vidyālakṣaṇe nitye svarūpe 'vatiṣṭhate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:453: aikātmye vibhāgasyāsatyatvāt, tadadhiṣṭhānaśravaṇādayo 'pyasatyāḥ kathaṃ kasmaicitkāryāya syuḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:454: asatyācca satyapratipattirmithyaiva, yathā dhūma iti mithyāgṛhītādbāṣpāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:458: bhavati hi māyā prīterbhayasya ca nimittam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:468: api ca abhedadarśanopāyā api na svarūpeṇa mithyā, yato brahmaivaiṣāṃ svarūpam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:473: na rekhāgavayo gavayatvena gavayāntarāṇāṃ pratipattihetuḥ, na rekhā varṇatvena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:475: etatsadṛśo gavaya iti, rekhā ca samayāt ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:476: īdṛśīṃ rekhāṃ dṛṣṭvāyaṃ varṇaḥ smartavya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:479: bālā hi rekhāsu varṇatvenaiva vyutpādyante loke 'bhedena ca vyapadeśaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:485: tataśca maraṇamūrcchādyanumānaṃ na vitatham, kālādi bhedayuktātsatyāhidaṃśādiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:486: yasyaiva kṣaṇikajñānamātmā tasyaiva tūpaneyāpaneyāsambhavānmokṣaśostrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:494: nātyantamasatī santatiḥ, nāpi satī, kalpanayā tu satī, tadvimokṣāya śāstrāṇi pravṛttayaśceti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:499: api cābhyupagamyāpi kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānamanādinidhanāyā eva santatermuktisaṃsārāvabhyupetau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:503: sa hyantyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcitkāryamārabheta vā, na vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:508: athārabhata eva kāryamantyaḥ santānāntare sārvajñe, sati hetuphalabhāve kathaṃ santānāntaram?
GSP33mbrahsiu:511: na ca sārvajñasya jñānasya caramakṣaṇa upādānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:518: vilakṣaṇakārye santatyuccheda iti, tasya rūpajñānaprabandhe viṣayāntaravijñānānnirvāṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:522: sā hi tasyāvasthā dehendriyādyupādhibhirakṛtāvacchedā bṛhatī brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:523: jñānasvabhāvatve ca sarvagatasya dehendriyanirapekṣasya nityatvājjñānasvarūpasya sannihitavividhajñeyabhedasya bṛhattaraḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:524: atha na vijānāti kiñcit, na tarhi jñānasvarūpaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:525: sakarmako hi jānātyartho nāsati karmasambandhe yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:531: yathā dāhako 'pi vahnirupanītaṃ dāhyaṃ dahati, nānupanītamadāhyaṃ ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:532: yathā ca sphaṭikadarpaṇādayaḥ [KKS_16] svacchāḥ prakāśasvabhāvā api yadevopanidhīyate yogyaṃ ca tacchāyāpattyā tadeva darśayanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:533: evamayaṃ puruṣo bhogāyatanaśarīrastho bhogasādhanendriyopanītān śabdādīn bhuṅkte,
GSP33mbrahsiu:542: manaḥsaṃyogamukhena sarve hi tadviṣayā viṣayatve 'sya vartante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:545: api cāsyābhedadarśanapariniṣpattyā sarvasminnātmabhāvamāpanne dṛśyābhāvādeva na darśanaṃ dṛksvabhāvasyāpi dagdhuriva vahnerdāhyābhāvānna dāhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:553: kaśca sarvataḥ preyasa ātmano 'bhāvamabhikāṅkṣedityapuruṣārtho mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:560: yasya tu nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgā paramānandasaṃvedanāvasthā tasyaivaikāntikaṃ puruṣārthatvamityalamatiprasaṅgena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:562: apariṇāmitvaṃ vā, pariṇāme pūrvadharmanivṛtteḥ kṣaraṇasya bhāvāt, tadvyudāsena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:563: kathaṃ [KKS_17] tāvacchabdātmatā? ‘paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ'ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:570: yathā devatāyāḥ sākṣātpūjāsambhavāttallāñchane dāruṇyaśmani vā pūjāvidhānaṃ tadbuddhyā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:574: ‘omityātmānaṃ dhyāyatha'; ‘omiti yuñjīta'iti yatra yogāṅgatā śrūyate tatraivam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:575: yatra tu yuñjītetyāderaśravaṇāttādātmya eva paryavasyati vākyam, tatra nettham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:577: atra hi sarvavāganugamena tadatyāgādoṅkāro vācastattvamiti darśayitvā vāgrūpātyāgācca rūpaprapañcasya ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:581: na ca sarvātmabhāva aupacārikaḥ stutyartha iti yuktam, mukhyārthatve 'pyavirodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:582: sarvasya hi pratyakṣādyanavaseyaṃ śāstragamyamidaṃ rūpaṃ na viruddhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:584: ‘tasmādvidvān'; iti ca sārvātmavida eva tena dhyānopadeśaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:589: ‘vāgeva viśvā bhuvanāni jajñe vāgevedaṃ bubhuje vāguvāca'ityādau vācaḥ sārvātmyaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:590: tathā vāksūkte vācaḥ sarvātmatvaṃ sarveśitvaṃ ca pradarśitam ---

GSP33mbrahsiu:703: na cātrālpīyānapi kleśaḥ, asakṛdabhayaśruteḥ ‘abhayaṃ vai brahma'; ityādi /

GSP33mbrahsiu:721: avidyāpūrvakarmanibandhanatve 'pyanādau saṃsāre 'nantatvātkarmaṇāmaniyatavipākakālatvācca pratisargāvasthāyā iva muktyavasthāyā api pratyudāvṛttibhayaṃ na vyāvartate /

GSP33mbrahsiu:1043: yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā [KKS_32] tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati'; iti /

GSP33mbrahsiu:1065: na ca jñānasahakārīṇi karmāṇi, jñānasya sādhyāntarābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1067: atha bandhahetuvicchedaḥ sādhya iti tasmin vicchinne tadabhāvānmucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1069: anādyavidyā, na tarhi pṛthaktadvicchedaḥ sādhyaḥ, yato vidyodaya evāvidyāvyāvṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1076: tattvāgrahaṇanimitto viparyāso nimittanivṛttau svayameva nivartiṣyate, tacca na /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1081: ato viparyayajñānasya nivṛttirvidyayā sādhyeti tatra jñānasya sahakāryapekṣā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1083: na khalu śuktikādiṣu viparyāsapurassaraṃ samupajātasamyagjñānāstannivṛttaye pṛthak prayatante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1085: yato virodhibhāvāntarotpāda eva pūrvapradhvaṃsaḥ, na śūnyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1095: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1101: tasya hi brahma gocaraḥ, na śābdasya vibhaktapadārthasaṃsargodgrāhiṇaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1103: kaḥ punarasya viśeṣaḥ, yena tadarthyate? spaṣṭābhatvam, na tasyopayogaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1104: jñānaṃ hi jñeyābhivyāptaye, śābdajñāne cotpanna āptameva jñeyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1105: pramiteḥ pratyakṣaparatvāttatra ca nairākāṅkṣyāttadarthyata iti cet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1121: anadhigata eva tarhi śabdena pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1125: yadi tarhi na śabdenādhigataṃ brahma, kathaṃ tasminnupāsanā pravartatām?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1134: kathaṃ khalvavagatabrahmātmabhāvo viditātmayāthātathyo mithyādarśananimittairdharmairyujyate? śrūyate ca ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1140: tathā ‘aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1147: niścite 'pi pramāṇāttattve sarvatra mithyāvabhāsā nivartante, hetuviśeṣādanuvartante 'pi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1152: abhyāso hi saṃskāraṃ draḍhayan pūrvasaṃskāraṃ pratibadhya svakāryaṃ santanoti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1163: draḍhiyasi ca mithyādarśanaje saṃskāre niścayā api mithyārthā bhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1165: tathā pramitarajjubhāvāyā api rajjvāḥ pramāṇānanusandhāne sarpabhrāntyā bhayadarśanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1166: tasmājjāte 'pi pramāṇāttattvadarśane anādimithyādarśanābhyāsapariniṣpannasya draḍhīyasaḥ saṃskārasyābhibhavāyocchedāya vā tattvadarśanābhyāsaṃ manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1177: api cānyathāniścaye 'pi raṅgagatā bharatādayo mithyāvabhāsena śokabhayādihetavaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1178: niścite 'pi guḍasya mādhurye tatra mithyātiktāvabhāso 'vitatha iva duḥkhayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1186: yadapi pṛthakkāryā eva karmavidhayo jñānādhikāramavatārayanti, apākṛtarṇatrayasya tatrādhikārāt ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1197: pratipannagārhasthyasyātmavidyayaiva kṛtakṛtyatāṃ manvānasya ṛṇāpākaraṇaṃ pratyanādṛtasya vihitākaraṇanimittasya pāpmano vidyodayapratibandhṛtvaṃ darśayati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1214: tathā cordhvaretasāṃ cāśramiṇāṃ vināpi tairviśuddhavidyodaya iṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1216: sādhanaviśeṣāddhi sā kṣipraṃ kṣiprataraṃ ca vyajyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1228: na hi sphaṭikamaṇeḥ pūrvarūpaṃ vinaṣṭamupadhānasannidheḥ, tadapagame vānyadutpannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1261: athābhāva eva sādhyaḥ, viśeṣairevāsya nirviśeṣairvyabhicāra iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1264: Originally Brahma- and Tarka-kāṇḍas were together;
GSP33mbrahsiu:1265: Vacaspati does not know this division.]
GSP33mbrahsiu:1277: āmnāyavirodhādeva tu pratyakṣādīni pramāṇatāyāḥ kimiti na cyavante?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1283: tathā ca teṣāṃ prāmāṇyamanumantavyam, tadapabādhane svarūpasyaiva tāvadasiddheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1293: karmavidhayo hi bhedāśrayā abhedāśrayāśca vedāntāḥ parasparaparāhatā asatyapi pramāṇāntaravirodhe durlabhaprāmāṇyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1299: sa taiḥ pratiṣṭhitārthairapahṛtaviṣayaḥ kalpanīyārtho bādhyate, tadanusāreṇa vārthakalpanāmarhati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1304: tulyabalatve 'pi pratyakṣādīnāmāmnāyasya ca vastuni vikalpānupapattervirodhe saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1317: śakyo hyāmnāyādevānādiravidyāsaṃskāro vibhramahetuḥ pratyakṣādiṣu saṃbhāvayituṃ niścetuṃ ca dehātmābhimāna iva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1320: pratyakṣādīnāṃ tu vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyam, avidyāsaṃskārsya sthemnā vyavahāraviparyayābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1321: yatra ca vyavahāraviparyayo na tatra prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1322: śabde tu saṃbhāvitadoṣe na tattvāvedanena prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1325: pratyakṣādīnāṃ tu vyavahāre saṃvādānna śakyate vyavahāravisaṃvādijñānaheturdoṣaḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1328: tato doṣānubandhaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1334: tasmācchabdasya prāmāṇyābhyupagame pramāṇāntaravirodhe 'pi tasyaiva balavattvamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1336: na pramitāvapekṣāvattā śabdasya pratyakṣādiṣu, kiṃ tu svarūpasiddhau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1346: dṛṣṭaṃ ca hetutvenāpekṣitāyā api pūrvasyāḥ pratipatteḥ parasyāḥ pratipatterbalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1357: tatrābhedaḥ samākṣiptabheda eva pratāyata iti vyāghātaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1367: tatra virodha eva nāstīti balābalacintā nāvatarati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1371: ‘dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam'; ‘aviśiṣṭastu vākyārthaḥ'iti ca avivakṣitārthatā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1373: na pramāṇasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ prāmāṇyam, yena tadvirodhe svarasaṃ jahyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1376: laukikāstu śabdāḥ pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ svārthamabhidadhatīti yuktā teṣāṃ tadanusāriṇī vṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1383: tatra dvitīyasyā api vṛtteḥ śabdānāṃ pravṛttidarśanāttayā pramāṇaviṣayalābhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1384: yatra tu śabdāḥ svarasena labhante viṣayam, tatra na pramāṇāntaravirodhādapāvartante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1389: anyathā pratyakṣādayo 'tyantamapabādhitāḥ (Ms A; @meva bādhitāḥ -- edition) syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1392: pramāṇe tu svarasasiddhaṃ parityajya kalpanāyāṃ na nibandhanamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1396: yadi matam, na pramāṇasya pramāṇāntarādanugrāhyatvam, api tu svata eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1401: apramāṇikā cārthavyavasthā, tataḥ svarasenāpratīteḥ, anyasya cābhāvāt, itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgācca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1402: prāmāṇyātsiddhādarthāntare pratītiḥ prāmāṇyānyathānupapattyā kalpanīyā, tatpratīteśca prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1403: svarasalabhye tvarthe pratītita eva prāmāṇyamiti netaretarāśrayatā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1404: tasmādvirodhe bādha eva pūrvasya pramāṇānusārī, tathā pratīteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1406: na khalu rajatajñānānugrahāya śuktiśakalajñānasya gocaro 'paraḥ kalpyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1408: yā khalu rajatādivibhramāṇāṃ gatiḥ, sā teṣāmapi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1409: yadi teṣāmupacaritaḥ kalpito vā viṣayaḥ, pratyakṣādīnāmapi tathā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1414: tasmātpratyakṣādivirodhe vedāntānāṃ tathābhāva iti, pratyakṣādiṣvapi tathā darśanāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1419: na taiḥ saṃbhūyakāritvam, nāmnāyasya pratyakṣādīnāṃ caikavākyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1425: yatra tvekavākyatayā saṃbhūyakāritvaṃ tatrānupajātavirodhitayā svarasavṛttyā mukhye sthite,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1426_1: parapadāni dvitīyayā vṛttyā pūrvāpekṣitamarthaṃ samarpayantyekavākyatāsāmarthyāditi mukhyabalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1429: te tu siddhaṃ bhedamupāśritya ‘idamanenetthaṃ sādhayet'; iti puruṣahitānuśāsanapradhānāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1438: atha bhavati kasya cittīvrakrodhākrāntasvāntatayā samuddhatadhvāntatiraskṛtavivekavijñānasyānarthamapyarthatvena paśyataḥ śāstropadeśamatikrāmataḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1444: tathāpi teṣāmatatparatvān na tatra prāmāṇyaṃ vṛttānteṣvivārthavādapadānām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1445: tathā ca kutastairvedāntānāṃ parāhatiḥ, vedāntairvā teṣām?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1449: tadevaṃ balavattve 'pyāmnāyasya yo nāma mandadhīrlaukikavacasāṃ pratyakṣādivirodha upacaritārthatvadarśanāllokavadvede 'pi śabdavṛttamiti manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1450: yo vā nirūḍhanibiḍatayā bhedadarśanāndhakārasya pratyakṣādīnāmeva balavattvaṃ manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1453: na hi yo nāma mandaviṣeṇa vṛścikena daṣṭo mriyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1456: vastusvarūpavidhiḥ vastvantarasya vyavacchedaḥ, ubhayaṃ vetti, ubhayasminnapi traividhyam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1457: yaugapadyam, vyavacchedapūrvako vidhiḥ, vidhipūrvako vyavaccheda iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1458: tatra vastvantaravyavacchede ubhayasmin vā bhedaḥ pratyakṣagocara iti bhavati virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1459: svarūpavidhimātre tu kasyacidvyavacchedena śūnye na bhedaḥ pramāṇārthaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1461: vidhimātravyāpāraṃ ca pratyakṣam, ato na virodhaḥ kathamityucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1468: ‘nedam iha'; ‘nāyamayam'iti siddhe bhūtale siddho ghaṭaḥ, gavi vā aśvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1471: na hi tatra kvaciddeśe kāle vā niṣedhaḥ, ātyantikatvāt, nāpi kutaścitsiddhi, atyantāsattvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1473: khapuṣpādiṣu tāvatsiddheṣu khādiṣu tadvidhāḥ puṣpādayo niṣidhyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1476: kutaścinnimittād buddhau labdharūpāṇāṃ bahirniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti varṇayanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1479: api cānapekṣitaviṣayaniṣedhye vyavacchede śūnyatā pramāṇārthaḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1482: yastu bhedāya vyavacchedaḥ sa bhedyayoḥ siddhimapekṣate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1483: na ca sā vidhānādṛta iti prāgvidhānameṣitavyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1487: na saṃnihitajaṃ tacca tadanyāmarśi jāyate // MBs_1.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1488: na khalvekapramāṇajñānavyāpārau santau vidhivyavacchedau kramavantau yujyete,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1490: kramavatorhi vyāpārayoḥ paścāttano na tadvyāpāraḥ syāt, vyavadhānāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1498: anavabhāsamāne hi tatra vyavacchedye vyavacchedamātraṃ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1499: na vyavacchedaḥ kasyacit, sarvasya vā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1512: iti ca saṃnihitārthasāmānye niṣedho vidhipūrva eva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1521: pūrvāpekṣayaiva ca tad dvirūpamudeti, anyathā ekarūpamevodīyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1522: api ca sarvavyavacchedānapākurvataḥ ko vyavacchedo 'bhimataḥ, yena pratyavasthīyeta?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1523: siddhaḥ sa loka iti cet, ayaṃ vā kiṃ na lokasiddhaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1537: mā sma bhūdaviśeṣeṇa mā na bhūdekadhījuṣām // MBs_1.7 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1552: satyamastyayaṃ vibhāgaḥ, na tvidānīṃ darśanapratiniyamasya sāmarthyam, tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1553: pratiniyatamapi tatra deśe kāle ca rūpe darśanaṃ tayoryathā rūpavidhimātropakṣayānna [KKS_47] rasaṃ vyavacchinatti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1561: naikasya bahava ātmāna iti cet, anyatastarhi virodhādvyavacchedaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1563: asati ca vyavacchede kuto bahutvam, kuto vā virodha itaretarāśrayaṃ vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1565: api ca ekaniyamādanyavyavacchede citrādiṣu nīlādīnāmekadarśanabhājāṃ bhedo na sidhyet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1571: yatprakṛtiḥ khalu yaḥ padārthaḥ sa tayaiva prakṛtyā vidheyaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1578: arūpeṇa ca bhinnatvaṃ vastuno nāvakalpate // MBs_1.8 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1579: na vyāvṛttirvastusvabhāvaḥ, sā khalvekānekādhiṣṭhānā pratijñāyate prajñāyate ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1580: tathā ca tasyā ekasyā anekavṛttervastusvabhāvatve vastūnāmapi bhedo na syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1582: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityarthāntarameva vyāvṛttirāsthīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1583: tathāpi vyāvṛtterarūpatvātsvarūpeṇa na bhāvā vyāvṛttāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1590: bhedaścedvastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ, naikaṃ kiñcana vastu syāt, bhedenaikatvasya virodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1608: na hi kalpitena svabhāvena pāramārthikī tadvattā yujyate, kalpitaiva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1612: bhedātmatve vastuna ekavastvabhāvaḥ, tadbhāvāditarasyāpīti vastvabhāvaḥ, tatrāhuḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1621: na khalu svahetuprāpitodayeṣu svabhāvavyavasthiteṣu vastuṣu svabhāvasthitaye vastvantarāpekṣā yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1623: na ca puruṣapratyayānuvidhāyīni vastūni, svahetubhyaḥ svasvabhāvavyavasthiteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1635: tathā hi pratiyogyapekṣaṃ tasya svarūpaṃ vyavasthitam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1636: tathā ca yathāyathaṃ bhedaiḥ pratiyogyapekṣairātmabhūtairbhinnāḥ sarve bhāvā iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1645: na tarhi hetubhyo bhāvasyāvikalātmalābhaḥ, bhedākhyasya rūpasya pratiyogyapekṣatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1646: hetvantarācca pratiyoginaḥ saṃpadyamānaḥ paścādbhedo na svabhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1650: nānapekṣaṃ kadācidittasya tadvidhatvāttena tadvidhenaiva saha jāyata iti na vikalarūpaprādurbhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1660: tathā hi, nānapekṣya pratiyoginaṃ bhedaḥ pratīyata iti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1663: yathā vyavasthitānapekṣasvabhāvā rūpādayaścakṣurādyapekṣāyāṃ pratītau na sāpekṣasvabhāvāḥ kathyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1666: tasmātpauruṣeyīmapekṣāyāṃ na vastvanuvarttate, ato na vastusvabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1668: na bhedo vastuno rūpam, āpekṣiko hi pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1675: bhedo 'pyevaṃ kiṃ na lokasiddhaḥ? api ca
GSP33mbrahsiu:1683: apekṣāhetuśca tatra sādhāraṇī kriyā vidyate vyavasthitayorapi vastunoḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1684: bhāvabhede tvayaṃ vastutattvagato vicāraḥ, na cāpekṣāhetuḥ kaścidupalabhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1687: hanta! arthakriyābhedādeva bhāvānāṃ parasparāpekṣo bhedaḥ setsyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1694: arthakriyākṛte bhede rūpabhedo na labhyate // MBs_1.10 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1696: nārthakriyābhedādbhāvānāṃ parasparāpekṣo rūpabhedaḥ pratīyate, nāpyanumātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1697: vyapadeśabhedamātraṃ tu syāt, ekasminnapi vahnau dāhapākādikāryabhedadṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1702: tau ca loke pratītibhedau satyapi saṃyogidravyavikriyāsāmānye /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1707: nanu nārthakriyābhedamātrādbhedaṃ brūmaḥ, api tu tatrāsaṃbhāvinyā adṛṣṭāyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1708: yathā cakṣuṣi satyapyadṛṣṭāyāśca badhire tatrāsaṃbhāvinyāḥ śabdabuddherindriyabhedaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1710: atha kāryāsaṃbhavaḥ kathaṃ pratyetavyaḥ? nanūktaṃ tatrādarśanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1712: yasya khalvadvayaṃ jagattasya kāryajātamekatraiva dṛśyata iti kathamadarśanam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1713: tatra siddhe bhede tatrādarśanam, tatrādarśanācca bhedasiddhiritītaretarāśrayānna bhedānumānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1722: yastu kṣaṇikavādī tattvameva viśeṣasya na manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1726: atha kāryābhede na (atha na kāryābhedena -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:1731: yathā tarhi kāryasvabhāvābhedāya na kāraṇasvabhāvābhedo 'pekṣyate, tathā
GSP33mbrahsiu:1739: hetvabhedaścenna [KKS_52] kāryābheda upayujyate, kastulyajātīyādvijātīyasya janma nivārayet?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1740: tatra yathā vyāvahārikādabhedātkāryābhedastathā vyāvahārikādbhedātkāryabheda iti na viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1742: kalpitaścedbhedaḥ kāryabhedāya prabhuḥ, na tarhi kalpitaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1760: naikasmin sa eva bhavati, na ca bhavatīti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1766: harṣaḥ śokaṃ hanti śokaśca tam, evamitareṣvapi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1774: yato nāvaśyam, yo yatra bhavati, sa taṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1775: na hi rathādayastatsaṃyogādayo vā nabho vyaśnuvate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1783: tathā ca payaso 'pi tailaṃ tilebhyaśca dadhi syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1784: tathaikasmiñjāyamāne sarvaṃ jāyeta, naśyati ca naśyet /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1790: yadi kāryanānātvaṃ vyavasthā, na tayā tilānāṃ payasaśca bhedaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1791: atha payaso dadhno janma, nānyata iti vyavasthā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1792: nānyatvaṃ siddhayā vyavasthayā pramitsitaṃ tallakṣaṇamanupraveṣṭumarhati, tasyā asiddhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1795: na hyekaviṣaya ekasya śaktyaśaktī yujyete iti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1797: yathā khalu dīrghakālāḥ padārthā mitakālairdharmaiḥ saṃbadhyamānāstaddharmāṇo 'taddharmāṇaśca na virodhapadabhājaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1799: kathamanantasyāntavān dharma iti cet, vyatireke 'nivarcanīyatve vā nāstyasaṃbhāvanāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1801: yo 'pi dīrghakālamarthaṃ na pratipadyate taṃ pratīdaṃ punaḥ paṭhitavyam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1803: eko 'pi vahniḥ kiñcideva dahati pacati ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1805: tathā na dāhāntarāṇi pākāntarāṇi vā karoti tasminneva dāhye pākye ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1806: tathā bījādayaḥ pratyekaṃ samarthā api nāṅkurāntarāṇi janayanti, nāpi sāmagrī /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1808: athaikasminneva janakaśaktiḥ, anyaṃ pradhvastamāgāminaṃ vaikaṃ kiṃ na janayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1812: abhede 'pi tarhi payasastilānāṃ dadhno 'nutpattau na virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1814: yasya tāvaddadhnaḥ payaso janma na tasya tilebhyo 'nutpattiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1819: na hi samarthamityeva kāraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tulyajātīyaṃ janayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1823: dadhne hi payo viniyujyate, na sikateti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1834: atha kalpanāviṣayādabhedāttatsiddhiḥ, parasyāpi tādṛśādbhedāditi na viśeṣa ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1837: tenaikatrāpi viruddhadharmāveśamabhyupayatā durlabha eva dadhno janakatvājanakatvābhyāṃ tilapayasorvibhāga iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1845: abhedādiva ca tādṛśāt kāryābhedasya bhedādapi tadvidhādbhedasyopapatteḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1859: utāmṛtatvasya'iti vā devamanuṣyalokabhedena prapañcādekaikasmātsamastācca vṛddhataraḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1860: tenāsmin parimitānāṃ viruddhābhimatānāmapyanante na samāveśo na yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1863: kṛtsno 'pi tāvadbhūtaprapañco 'sya kanīyān bhāga iti, kiṃ punaḥ pratyekam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1873: kalpite 'pi kāryabhedādyavasthāyā vā kāraṇabhede kimiti na kāryāntaram?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1874: kimiti vā na saṃkaraḥ, viparītā vā vyavasthā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1875: bhede 'pi payasaḥ, tilebhya eva tailaṃ na sikatābhyaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1877: bhede 'pi ca tilebhyastailaṃ payaso dadhi, na tu payasastailaṃ tilebhyo dadhi? yadi matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1880: tebhyaḥ kāryasya bhedaḥ, vyavasthā, na viparyayaśceti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1887: tatra yadi vahnirapi kāraṇam, kathaṃ naikasmādanekaṃ kāryam? atha śaktīnāmeva kāraṇatvamabhipraiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1892: yadi caikasyānekasaṃbandhavirodhaḥ, kathaṃ nānābhūtābhiḥ śaktibhirekaḥ saṃbadhyate?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1893: tatra yathaikasyārthasvabhāvasya nānāśaktiyogaḥ, tathā nānākāryayogo 'pi kiṃ nānujñāyate?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1898: kāryagatena tvāśrayāntarasamavāyinā virudhyata iti subhāṣitam! athārthāntaratvameva śaktīnām,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1900: saṃśleṣaścet, na bhinnatve rūpāvibhāgalakṣaṇaḥ saṃśleṣaḥ, bheda eva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1906: tatra yathā bhinnāsu śaktiṣu tadbhedādupakārān bhinnāneko 'rthasvabhāvaḥ karoti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1911: itaretarābhāvāṃśo hi bhāvānāṃ bhedaḥ, na so 'kṣagocaraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1915: sā asiddhe bhede vyavasthāyā (Ms C; kāryavyavasthāyā -- edition) evānupapattestatrāyuktā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1925: na khalu yadvyavacchidyate, yataśca vyavacchidyate, tayorapratipattau vyavacchedagatiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1937: sa ca na siddhatvenāsiddhatvena vā yujyata ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1939: bhedapratipattau sarvasya sarvato bhedagatiḥ syāt, aviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1946: na cānyathā pratiyogitvam, sāmānyopalabdhau ca sthāṇau
GSP33mbrahsiu:1966: na caiṣa viśeṣaḥ prāgvastubhedasiddheḥ sidhyatīti tadevetaretarāśrayatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1972: yastu saṃyogātsamavāyādvā saṃkaraḥ, so 'bhāvākhyena pramāṇenāpanīyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1982: ‘ayamasau na bhavati'; iti jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vā pramāṇāntaraṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1986: api ca sanmātrarūpe sarvatra pratīyamāne tatsvabhāveṣu vastuṣu netarābhimata itarābhimatapramāṇānutpādaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1991: pratyabhijñānāddhi tadavagamyate (tadavagamyeta Ms A; tadgamyeta edition) /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1992: na cārthamātraṃ dṛṣṭavato 'rthāntare sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñāsti yathaikāṃ gāṃ dṛṣṭavato gavāntare /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1998: na vyavacchedaḥ kevalaḥ, na vidhisahitaḥ, na vidheḥ paścātpramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2000: tatra yadyekamapi na gamyate nirviṣayataiva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2001: apratyabhijñānaṃ ca yadi govailakṣaṇyāducyeta satyapi sanmātrarūpānugame,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2004: na hi yādṛśo devadattasya punardarśane ekatvapratyayastādṛśo gavāntare /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2005: athāsti tatra tāvatpūrvāparānusandhānam, na tu sataḥ sadantare /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2013: grahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇākhyeyaṃ jñātrā śuddhaṃ tu gṛhyate //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2014: na ca yathā maṇikaṃ dṛṣṭavato maṇikāntare 'nusandhiḥ tathā śarāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mṛjjātirapyapahnūyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2015: athāsti tatrāpi, na tu yathā maṇikāntare sāmānyarūpāṇāṃ bhūyastvādutkaṭaḥ, alpasāmānyānugamāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2035: nanūktena prakāreṇa pramāṇādanyato 'pi bhedajñānasyodayo na saṃbhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2036: ko vānyathāha? na hi paramārthato bhedāvagamo 'sti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2037: yadi syāt, kathaṃ bhedo 'pahnūyeta? apahnave vā kathaṃ tadavagamaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2040: yathāvabhāsaṃ vedyasadbhāve ca na vibhramaḥ, kiṃ tu samyagjñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2042: tasmānna paramārthataḥ sattvena nirucyate, nāpyasattvena, loke siddhatvātsarvapravādeṣvityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2058: samānādhikaraṇatvena hīme prakhye jāyete ‘san ghaṭaḥ, gauḥ svastimatī'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2059: na vyadhikaraṇatvena yathā nīlapītaprakhye, yathā vā ‘daṇḍo devadattaḥ'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2061: na ca vastubhedaviṣayatve sāmānādhikaraṇyamavakalpate satyapi saṃbandhe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2062: saṃbandhidvayaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvena dvābhyāmekayā vā buddhyā gṛhyate, na tu parasparātmatvena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2071: tanna, samavāye 'pi tābhyāṃ rūpabhedasyānapāyāt, anyathā bhedābhāvādasaṃbandhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2074: atastayā viruddhaḥ prakhyābhedo na vastubhedavyavasthāyai prabhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2077: tasya khalveṣa sāmarthyātiśayaḥ, yena bhedavatāmarthānāṃ bhedaṃ tirodadhāti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2091: dṛṣṭaḥ saṃsargadharmo 'yaṃ yadyekamapi vai tathā // MBs_1.17 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2093: dṛṣṭaṃ khalvekamapi vividhāvabhāsam, yathā citraṃ rūpam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2097: rūpasaṃskārābhāve hi na sa cākṣuṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2102: atha nārūpaḥ pratīyata iti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, [KKS_62] citro 'pi tatheti nārūpaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2104: tathā nagaratrailokyādibuddhayo vividhaviṣayākārā nirbhāsante bhedābhāve 'pīti viṣayākārajñānavādino manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2105: na caikabuddhitattvāvyatirekādviṣayākārāḥ parasparato 'pi vyāvartante, prāgeva buddheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2110: na ca saṃbandhisaṃbandhaḥ saṃsargo vyavadhānataḥ // MBs_1.18 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2121: ityādibuddhayo vyavahārāṅgabhūtā dravyeṣu guṇajātyupādhinibandhanāḥ tasyaitā na yathāvastu,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2125: evaṃ ca pratyayaviracitenaivāyamarthena vyāvṛtto vyavahāro 'nuvṛttaśceti vyarthā vastubhedakalpanā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2127: yathārthatvāya hi vyāvahārikīṇāṃ buddhīnāṃ vastubhedaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2130: asati vastubhede 'yathārthamapyanuvṛttavyāvṛttāvagrahaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ vijñānaṃ nodetumarhati, bījābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2131: na khalu sthāṇuśakalādiṣu puruṣarajatādivibhrāntayo nirbījāḥ, sāmānyanibandhanatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2137: tatrāsati vastubheda ādhyātmiko doṣo 'vidyālakṣaṇo vyāvahārikajñānabījamiti nārtho vastubhedena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2149: viruddhamiti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ? yatpramāṇaviparyayeṇa vartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2150: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāve viruddhatvābhidhāne kaṃ batāyamāśritya hetuṃ viruddhatvāviruddhatve vyavasthāpayet?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2153: tadidamasāṃpratam, yato nedṛśāṃ vipratiṣiddhārthajñānānāṃ prāmāṇyameva yujyate saṃśayajñānavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2154: anyathā saṃśayaviṣayo 'pi dvyātmā syāt, dvyābhāsatvāttasya sāmānādhikaraṇyācca tadavabhāsayoḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2156: na saṃśayite rūpasamuccayāvagamaḥ, yathā sāmānyaviśeṣavati, ‘ayaṃ vā, ayaṃ vā'iti pratīteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2159: ekamapi tarhi na dvyātmakam, ekasya dvyātmakatāvirodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2160: tatra yathā saṃśayajñānaṃ vipratiṣedhādapramāṇaṃ tathā sāmānyaviśeṣapratipattirapi, aikādhikaraṇyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2162: na saṃśayajñānaṃ vipratiṣedhādapramāṇam, nirṇayajñānena tu bādhanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2163: yatra tarhi na nirṇayastatra vikalpātmatā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2165: evaṃ virodhe 'pi dvayorekasya vā jñānasya viruddharūpopagrahe tadrūpādhigatyoranyonyanirākaraṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2167: parasparanirākṛtau tulyabalatve sandeha iti na saṃśayajñānādekasya sāmānyaviśeṣapratipattirviśiṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2179: tatra sāmānyaviśeṣayoryadi svarūpavirodho 'nyonyābhāvaḥ, naikatvaṃ bhedānāmiva parasparam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2183: yathā na sāmānyāṃśo dvirūpo viśeṣāṃśo vā rūpavirodhābhāvāt ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2192: yena sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ svarūpavirodhābhāvāddvitvaṃ na syādanyatarasyeva bhāgasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2194: sāmānyaviśeṣayośca parasparātmatvena pratipatterasatyapyanyonyābhāvalakṣaṇe svarūpavirodhe buddhe rūpabhedāddvitvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2199: na cetkutastyamekatvamasti ced dvyātmatā katham // MBs_1.22 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2208: buddhirūpabhedaḥ parasparātmābhāvaśca (Mss AB; parasparātmatābhāvaśca -- edition) bhedalakṣaṇam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2214: buddhirūpābhedaḥ (Ms B; buddheḥ rūpābhedaḥ -- edition) parasparātmapratipattiśca dve abhedalakṣaṇe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2216: viśeṣāṇāṃ tu na buddhe rūpāvibhāgaḥ, na parasparātmapratipattiriti bhinnā iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2221: lakṣaṇabhede 'pi cettattvam, anyatvaṃ ca lakṣaṇābhede 'pi yadi, vyarthataiva lakṣaṇasya syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2227: ekatve tu yathā sāmānyaviśeṣavibhāgayoḥ svabuddhisamadhigatayorna vilakṣaṇaṃ buddhyantaramarthyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2228: tathā sāmānyabuddherna buddhyantaraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣādhigamāya prārthyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2236: bhedādekayā buddhyā na grahaṇam, na punarabhedādgrahaṇamiti buddhyantaravaiyarthyam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2243: tatra hetubhāvāt phalabhāvaḥ syāt, tasya kāraṇatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2250: sāmānyaṃ na hi vastvātmā na bhedaścitra eva saḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2252: yasyaikamubhayātmakaṃ vastu na tasya sāmānyamātraṃ vastuna ātmā na viśeṣamātram /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2256: yasya tvanugamaḥ sa vasturūpaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2257: tathā ca śabdāntaramavalambya bhedā eva satyā ityetatpratipādyate śabdāntareṇa vā hetunā dvyātmakamekamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2260: mā bhūdvastu tadaṃśatvaṃ tu na vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2265: nāpi vastuno 'nyatsvayaṃ vastu, sāmānyaviśeṣatadvatāṃ trayāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ prasaṅgāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2268: nanu nāṃśoṃ 'śino 'rthāntaraṃ nāpi sa eva, ubhayathānaṃśatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2274: api tvananugama (api tvananugama -- edition) eva tasya samudāyātmakatvādekābhāve 'pyabhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2276: itaretarāpekṣau vā sāmānyaviśeṣau vastu, tatsamāhāro vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2288: tadevaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ tadbhāvānyabhāvābhyāmabheda ityadvaitaṃ jagadityuktamanyaprakārayā vācā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2295: gavāśvasya tu pratyekaṃ gavāśvatve bhedābhāvādanibandhanameva tat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2299: kimubhayarūpatvādvastuno vastvantare 'nugamo nāsti? aśvavastu govastu na bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2302: atha viśeṣavyāvṛttāvapi tadvastvanugatam, bhavatyaśvo gauḥ (bhavatyaśvo 'pi -- edition) /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2311: tatra pūrvasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ na vastuno 'nugama ityananvitāni vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2313: sarvathā yena viśeṣeṇāyamaśvādgovastu vyavasthāpayatyanyat tadviśeṣayujastu tasyānanvayādbhedavādaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2314: athānanvayadoṣānna viśeṣamāśrayati abhedavāda iti na dvaitādvaitakalpanopapadyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2316: teṣāmapi dravyanayaḥ paryāyanaya eva vā // MBs_1.26 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2319: tasya (tasya tu Ms A; tasya ca -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:2321: na ca te dravyameva, tasya sthitimattvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2327: vardhamānakabhaṅgena rucakakriyāyāṃ na kiñcidutpannaṃ naṣṭaṃ veti prītiśokau tadarthinorna syātām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2328: atha tu paryāyamātram, hemārthino madhyasthatā na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2329: paryāyamātre hi hemni hemno vināśātparyāyavināśe kathaṃ madhyasthatā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2338: paryāyāntare ca paryāyāntarasyānanugamādananvitāni tarhi vyāvṛttasvabhāvāni vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2355: tasya utpattisthitibhaṅgānāmekatra samavāye dravyārthino madhyasthatā bhavet, na bhavecca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2357: na hi taddravyamavatiṣṭhata eva, vinaśyatyapūrvaṃ cotpadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2358: tatra vināśādapūrvotpatteśca prītiśokau syātām, na madhyasthatā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2367: abhedo 'pyastīti kiṃ na bhavati? atha nātyantamabhedaḥ, tena na saṃkaraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2369: na cāsya kiñcitkvacidekāntataḥ sarvatrānekāntamabhyupayataḥ, yenāyaṃ viśeṣa ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2373: apravṛttinivṛttīdaṃ prāptaṃ sarvatra hī jagat // MBs_1.28 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2374: yadā hi sarvaprakāreṣvanaikāntikatvaṃ bhāvānām, tathā sati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2375: nāyaṃ lokaḥ kvacidabhimatasādhanatāprakāramavadhārya pravarteta, yato nāsau tathaiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2381: prītimadhyasthatāśokāḥ syurna syuriti durghaṭamiti, tatra brūyuḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2383: prītimadhyasthatāśokā naikāntataḥ santi, naikāntato na santīti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2386: yadi khalu prītyādīnāṃ sadasattve [KKS_70] naikāntike ('naikāntike -- edition) ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2389: tathā duḥkhanivṛttyarthī na duḥkhasādhanasaṃparkaṃ pariharet, tasyāsattvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2392: evaṃ tāvanna dve vastunī, naikaṃ dvyātmakam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2398: naikajñānaṃ samīkṣyaikaṃ na bhedaṃ tattvahānataḥ // MBs_1.29 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2400: kutaḥ? āpekṣiko hi bhedo nānyamanapekṣya śakyate grahītum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2405: na tvevam (Ms A; na caivam -- edition) abhedagrahaṇamabhedagrahaṇāpekṣam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2408: tatrābhedaṃ gṛhītvā tamupādāya tasya yathāvanniścayāśaktau vyavacchedakalpanopapadyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2418: asati caikasmin kimāśrayā bhedāśaṅkā syāt, yasyānusaṃdhānādekatvamucyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2427: sa tu bhedaḥ śabdenāsaṃsparśānna tathopalakṣyate, yathā vikalpabuddhau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2429: na copalakṣyate pratyakṣabuddhau viśeṣaḥ prakāśate ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2431: yastu saṃvittāveva vipratipadyate sarvānātmavyāvṛttaspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ pratyakṣamiti vadan, tasyottaram ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2436: vastudvayānupapatterekasya ca dvyātmatāyogādavaśyakalpanīye 'nyatarasya mithyātve yuktaṃ viśeṣāvabhāsasya mithyātvam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2439: na hi vastumātravyabhicāraḥ kvacijjñāne dṛṣṭo 'sti, antatastasyaiva vastunaḥ pratibhāsanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2440: dṛṣṭatadbhāvasyaiva tatkalpanā laghvī, kḷptatvādyogyatāyāḥ, itaratra tu kalpyatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2442: mānasya eva buddhayaḥ kḷptayogyabhāvā mithyātvaṃ prati, nendriyajanmānaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2452: tatropādhau pratīyantāṃ tathā bhinnā na rūpataḥ // MBs_1.32 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2458: nanu nānyonyābhāvo nāma kaścit, yo bhāvānāṃ tattvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vā syāt arthasiddhirevaiṣā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2460: api ca bhedatvādeva viśvasya bhedo 'bhedopādāna iti śakyate 'numātum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2476: bhedo yathā taraṅgāṇāṃ bhedādbhedaḥ kalāvataḥ // MBs_1.34 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2488: tarubhedastu yadyapi na mṛṣā, vanamityabhedānugamaśca na pratyekam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2489: na hi pratyekaṃ taruṣu vanamiti buddhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2502: vyāvṛttasvabhāvasya tadagrahe grahaṇameva hi na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2512: athāsvabhāvāḥ, teṣāṃ kathaṃ tulyā? athānādivāsanopādāno na vastugataviśeṣāpekṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2514: kāsucideva hi vyaktiṣu kaścidevāvabhāsaḥ (Ms B; kaścidevābhedāvabhāsaḥ -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:2516: tasmātprakṛtyaiva kecitkasyacidabhedāvamarśasya yogyāḥ kecinneti svabhāvaviparītā bhāvānāṃ sāmarthyātiśayā kalpayitavyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2518: ekasyaivāstu māhātmyaṃ yadeko 'pi nānevāvabhāsate (nāneva bhāsate -- edition), laghutvātkalpanāyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2519: na tu bhinnānāṃ te sāmarthyātiśayāḥ, yadamī abhinnā iva bhāsante (ivāvabhāsante -- edition) /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2533: [KKS_74] evaṃ pratyakṣādivirodhātkarmavidhivirodhācca śrutārthaparigrahe ye manyante vedāntānāmupacaritārthatvaṃ tatpratibodhanāya vihitaḥ prayatnaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2535: kārya evārthe vedasya prāmāṇyam, na bhūtarūpe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2539: codanā ca pravartakaṃ vacanam, tasmātkārye 'rthe vedaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2542: tathā ca kathaṃ tarhi mantrārthavādāḥ sopaniṣatkā ityāśaṅkya ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:2555: tatra yacchabdādeva jñānaṃ tadavidheyam, vidhimantareṇa bhāvātkarmāvabodhavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2556: yathaiva ‘svargakāmo yajeta'; iti śrutavākyasya vākyārthāvabodhastadvākyaprāmāṇyādeva bhavati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2560: na khalu sopakaraṇe samagre pramāṇe satīcchāpi puruṣasyāpekṣyate jñānaṃ prati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2565: na karmavidhivākyārthajñānapravṛttau vidhirapekṣyate 'nyaḥ, na tadgata eva vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2575: apravṛtto 'pi hi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhivākyādhyayane puruṣāntarādhītāttatastasya cānyeṣāṃ ca vākyānāmadhyayane pravartate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2580: tadarthabodhaścedvidhyapekṣaḥ, na tatra sa eva pravartayati, anavabuddhārthatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2585: ‘dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam'; iti nyāyaprāpto 'rthaḥ pradarśyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2592: yathaiva ‘svargakāmo yajeta'; iti sāmānyavidhinā siddhe nānyo 'pekṣyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2600: anyonyasaṃśrayānnaiṣa śābdo bodhaḥ sa no paraḥ // MBs_2.3 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2601: śabdādavagamya vidheyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ sā vidheḥ prayojanam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2607: yastu tattvāvabodhaparādvākyāttattvāvabodhaḥ, nāsau śabdārthabodhātparācīnaḥ, kintu sa eveti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2609: jāte bodhe na pravartyo natarāṃ khalvabodhake /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2610: śabde na (śabdena -- edition) niścaye tasmādanyasmādanyavāñchanam // MBs_2.4 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2621: utpanne 'pi tattvāvabhāse śabdāt, niścaye pravartyaḥ ‘evamidam'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2624: athānyato niścayaḥ, anyavāñchanaṃ pramāṇāntarāpekṣā, na tatra tattvaniścayanibandhanaṃ śabdaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2627: artho jñātavya ityukte jñeyaḥ syānnāvivakṣitaḥ // MBs_2.5 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2629: satyapi vākyādarthopaplave tātparyaṃ durlabham, bhūtārthaparasya vaiyarthyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2650: yato vidhāyakaśabdanibandhanamanyeṣāṃ vivakṣitārthatvam, vidhāyakasya tu na tannibandhanamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2651: evaṃ ca tasyāvivakṣitārthatve itare 'pi tathā syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2652: atha vidhāyakaḥ prakṛtyā dṛṣṭārthatvena cārthaparaḥ, itare 'pi tatheti vyartho 'sau vidhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2656: tacchabdato labdhajanmano 'pyātmatattvāvabodhasya puruṣārthasādhanatvāvagamo vidherityetadapi na śobhanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2658: iṣyate mokṣa iti cetsādhyastattvacyuterna saḥ // MBs_2.9 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2660: jñātrā jñeyābhivyāptiḥ, jñātāraṃ prati tasya prakāśanam (prakāśatā -- edition) ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2661: na tvadṛṣṭaṃ kālāntarabhāvi, yadartho vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2670: bhāvarūpaṃ tu mokṣaṃ niratiśayānandalakṣaṇaṃ niratiśayaiśvaryalakṣaṇaṃ cābhipretyaitaducyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2675: tathāpi nāsau tattvajñānātpṛthagiti na tena sādhyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2676: avidyā hi bandhahetuḥ, tattvajñānodaya eva ca tannivṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2677: athavā ‘paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate'; iti svarūpasthitirmuktiruktā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2682: punarāvartate'; iti śruteḥ prāmāṇyātkāryasyāpi mokṣasya nityatvamiti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2685_0: yadā tu viditātmatattvasyādvayaṃ viśuddhaprakāśamātmānaṃ paśyataḥ samutkhātāyāmanavayavenāvidyāyāṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:2688: na ca kāmopabandho 'sti, yataḥ sādhyatā gamyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2690: arthavādādapi ca yā phalakalpanā, sāpi jñāne jñeyatattvāvabhāsadṛṣṭaphalanirākāṅkṣe 'nupapannā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2701: anuvādaśca pramāṇāntaraviṣaya iti tadapekṣo bhūtārtho nārtha ucyata iti sāpekṣatvādaprāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2705: evaṃ ca sati tattvapratipattipare vākye yadyapi vākyārthabodhātparācīnā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2710: uta bhūtārthatā tatra siddhārthamapi yadvacaḥ // MBs_2.13 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2716: yattu bhūtārthamapi na mānāntarādhigata iti bodhayati na tadanuvādakam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2720: sāpekṣatāyāḥ ko hetuḥ śuddhā siddhārthatā yadi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2727: evaṃ ca puruṣabuddhiprabhavaṃ bhūtārthamabhūtārthaṃ vā vaco bhavati sāpekṣam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2728: tato hi tatsaṃbhinna evārthe pratyayaḥ, na tvanapekṣitapūrvādhigamaḥ svātantryeṇārthe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2730: ‘api ca pauruṣeyādvacanād ‘evamayaṃ puruṣo veda'iti bhavati pratyayaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2739: asaṃbhavati tu kārye 'rthe na kutaścidvisaṃvādāśaṅketi nāpekṣyamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2742: viśeṣo na hi gamyeta sāpekṣatve tadā tayoḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2745: yadi śabdaḥ pramāṇāntarādhigataviṣayo loke dṛṣṭa iti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2746: pramāṇāntarasyāviṣaye tarhi natarāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tasya bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2747: pramāṇāntaraviṣaye hi pramāṇāntarasaṃbhavādapi tāvatsyāt, anyatra tadabhāvād durlabhaṃ tat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2748: atha pauruṣeyatvakāritā lokavacasāṃ pramāṇāntarādhigatārthatā, na śabdasāmarthyakāritā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2750: na tarhi pramāṇāntarasaṃbhavācchabda eva sāpekṣaḥ, tadapi śabdasaṃbhavācchabdāpekṣaṃ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2757: tasya ca prāmāṇyamanapekṣatvāt, anapekṣatvaṃ ca śabdasyāprāmāṇyāditaretarāśrayam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2758: pramāṇe hi śabde tadviṣaye saṃbhavati tadapi sāpekṣaṃ syāttatsaṃbhava iva śabdaḥ, viśeṣābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2774: api ca pratyakṣādhigataviṣayaṃ kiñcidanumānamiti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya tathā pratyakṣasāpekṣatā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2775: yathā cāgamapūrvakaṃ ṣaḍjādivivekaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti na sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tathā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2776: evaṃ puruṣavacasāṃ pramāṇāntarādhigataviṣayatvadarśane 'pi nāpauruṣeyasya tathābhāvo bhūtārthasyāpi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2790: vede tu sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi na puruṣavivakṣāpūrvakaḥ ityanapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2791: yo vā viṣayaniyojyaniyogānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ, sa puruṣabuddhiviracito lokavākye /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2799: tadbhāve loke sāpekṣatvāt, tadabhāve vede nirapekṣatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2800: na viṣaye pramāṇāntarasaṃbhavaḥ, tadabhāve 'pi lokaniyoge sāpekṣatvadarśanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2803: loke vede na vyapekṣā talloke ca vyapekṣaṇam // MBs_2.22 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2804: niyogaparyavasitaṃ vaidikaṃ vacaḥ, sa ca pramāṇāntarasyāgocara ityanapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2805: sādhyasādhanabhāvaniṣṭhaṃ tu laukikaṃ vacaḥ, sa pramāṇāntaraviṣaya iti sāpekṣatā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2810: anyatra viniyogaḥ, yathā gośabdasya sāsnādimān, aśvaśabdasya kesarādimān /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2812: loke cedviniyogaḥ śabdārthaḥ, tatraivāsya sāmarthyamadhigatam, na niyoge /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2813: tatra vede 'pi viniyoga eva pramāṇārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2833: yadi puruṣo 'dhigate viṣaye vacaḥ prayuṅkte iti viniyogaviṣayatā tasya kalpyate pramāṇāntarāpekṣatvāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2838: vacaḥ prayuṅkte puruṣo nākasmāttena tadgiri // MBs_2.26 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2845: na cānupalabhyāyaṃ bravīti'; iti tatra prāmāṇyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2847: yatra tūpalabdherasaṃbhava eva yathā dṛṣṭārthe buddhādivākye,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2853: [KKS_84] ata eva pauruṣeyatvāpauruṣeyatve sāpekṣatvānapekṣatvakāraṇe nyāyavidbhirdaśite pauruṣeyatvanirākaraṇaprayatnena ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2855: autpattike śabdārthasambandhe 'svātantryācchabdasya na puruṣabuddhipūrvakatvamiti na pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnā śabdādarthāvagatiriti nirapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2862: atha pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave 'pi yadi codanāprāmāṇyaṃ na vyāhanyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2865: pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave hi sarvajñābhimatabuddhādyupadiṣṭo 'pi dharmaḥ pratīyeta tatra na dharmatattvamavadhāritaṃ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2868: athavā tadvirodhāccodanāyā bādhaḥ syāt, saṃśayo vā tulyabalatve, tena tasyāsaṃbhavaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2873: yataḥ yadarthasya pratipādakam, na tu tadapekṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2887: atha saṃsargabhājo no padārthāḥ kriyayā vinā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2888: kimāyātaṃ vidheḥ sāpi tvastyādiḥ sulabhā kva na // MBs_2.29 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2906: yat pramāṇenāvagamyate tatra ‘asti'; iti vyavahāro laukikānām viparyaye ‘nāsti'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2914: tathā cāstyarthaniṣṭhaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇāntarāpekṣamevārthaṃ bodhayati pramāṇaviṣayatāyā astyarthatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2919: bhidyetottarakāle vā bhavantī na khalu tridhā // MBs_2.31 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2928: tatra yadi buddhiḥ pramāṇaviṣayatāṃ gocarayati pramite hi syāt na pramāṇādeva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2929: na hi prāk pramāṇotpatteḥ san pramāṇasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2934: tathāpi naiva bhidyeta netthaṃ cānyavyapekṣatā // MBs_2.32 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2940: na traividhyam, sarvasya pramitau pramāṇasaṃbandhasya vartamānatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2943: syālliṅgamapi sāpekṣaṃ tatsiddhestata eva cet // MBs_2.33 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2951: bhūtāyāṃ dṛṣṭau kasyacidbhūtaṃ pratyakṣam, bhaviṣyantyāṃ bhaviṣyat, vartamāne 'gnau vartamānamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2966: yuktaṃ liṅgasya prāmāṇyamevam, arthe tasya pramāṇāntarasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2972: iti jñānaniṣṭhānāmatīndriyārthe jñānasyāsaṃbhavānnārthe prāmāṇyamatīndriyārthopadeśinām, tathātrāpi syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2977: meyatvameva sattā cenmāne trividhatā kutaḥ // MBs_2.35 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2984: na pramāṇatraividhyādarthe traividhyam, mīyamānasya sattvātsataśca vartamānatvāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3000: pramite ca na jijñāsā punaḥ syātsadasattvayoḥ // MBs_2.38 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3001: anāśritakālaviśeṣe pramāṇayogamātre sattve pramitanaṣṭamapi vastu saditi tenārthakriyāprasaṅge 'naṣṭeneva, sattvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3003: sa eva tarhi viśeṣaḥ sadasadvyavahāravyavasthāyā hetuḥ kāryavyavasthāyā iva, na pramāṇayogaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3006: kiṃ ca pramite 'rthe sadasattve jijñāseranna punarlaukikāḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3008: atha pramāṇayogyatvaṃ sattā (Mss AB; sattvaṃ -- edition) naṣṭācca taccyutam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3013: sā ca naṣṭāccyuteti na tasya sattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3014: smaryamāṇe tu kutaściccyutā kutaścinneti na sarvasyāsattvamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3024: tathā ca so 'stiśabdenābhidhīyata ityarthasvabhāvaniṣṭham [KKS_89] astyarthapradhānaṃ vākyamiti kutaḥ sāpekṣatvam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3027: bhinnā evārthasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇaṃ prati yogyāḥ sacchabdavācyāḥ santu, naikā sattā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3032: api ca yadi tasyānekatvam, kathamabhinnaśabdapravṛttiḥ? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3040: yo hi sattāmavajānīte sa dravyatvādīnyapyavajānīta eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3041: na kila tejo dṛṣṭavato 'psu tadavamarśo bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3042: api ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā api santa eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3054: tatra na sarvārthasaṃgrahaḥ syāt, yathā ‘navavidho gośabdārthaḥ'iti nānyeṣāmabhāva eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3062: athaitāvān pramāṇayogyo 'rthakriyāsāmarthyo veti pramāṇayogyatve 'rthakriyāsāmarthye vā saṃgrahaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3066: bhinnanimittatve cākṣādiśabdebhya iva [KKS_90] nimittabhedātsaṃśayaḥ syāt, na viśeṣapratītiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3067: na hi ‘san ghaṭaḥ'; iti nimittabhedeṣu pratipattāraḥ saṃśerate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3068: yathaiva ‘śuklaḥ paṭaḥ'iti nirākāṅkṣaḥ, tathā ‘san ghaṭaḥ'; ityapi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3069: yastu dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma rūpaṃ vijñānamiti vā saṃśayaḥ, na sa laukikānām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3078: yatra tu śabdāt, tatra viśeṣāvagamahetorvinā sākāṅkṣatvameva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3086: na ca niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhānānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo bhavati daṇḍābhāvaniścaya iva ‘daṇḍī na vā'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3087: bhavati ca śūnyanagarādiṣu ciranikhātanidhiṣu pramāṇābhāvaniścaye 'pi ‘santi na'iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3091: vṛttapramāṇasaṃbandhasya pramāṇopalakṣitatvātsattvameva syāt, nāsattvam, na saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3095: atha vaikalpikīyaṃ pramāṇottarakālateti matam, liṅgānna syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3096: atha nirjñātakāryasaṃbandhameva liṅgenānugamyate, evaṃ tarhi prameyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3103: tasmādyathaiva nīlādiśabdārtho 'rthasvabhāvaḥ, na kāryalakṣyaḥ, na pramāṇalakṣyaḥ, anavasthānāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3106: kāryapramāṇasadasadbhāvanibandhane hi sadasadvyavahāravibhāge tasyāpravṛttireva kāryapramāṇasadasadvyavahāravibhāgasyāpi tannibandhatvaprasaṅgāt, anavasthānāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3107: tasmādarthasvabhāva ekā satteti (@svabhāva ekaḥ satteti -- edition) brahmavido manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3114: bhūmau nikhātamavidyamānendriyasaṃbandhamadṛśyamānāvinābhūtamasaṃvedyamānānyathānavakalpamānaṃ vastu pralīnadraṣṭṛkaṃ yattasya na pratyakṣānumānārthāpattyāgamahetavaḥ santi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3118: tatra pramāṇahetubhāvalakṣaṇayogyatārūpe sattve pramāṇahetvabhāvasya niścayātsaṃśayo na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3119: atha svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ kaścitpramāṇaṃ prati yogyaḥ sattvam, prakṛtahānādasundaramityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3120: atha vā pramāṇaviśiṣṭaḥ sacchabdārtha ityetadanena nirākriyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3121: na niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhāyiśabdānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo yukta iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3125: amitaṃ hi tathā kasmāttathā na punaranyathā // MBs_2.41 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3128: tatra yadi pramāṇasyāviṣayaḥ, yadi [KKS_92] sarvaśaktiviraho vāsadbuddherviṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3130: aparicchinnaṃ hi tathā pramāṇena kimiti tadvidham, na punaranyathā syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3131: na cettasya tathābhāve 'tathābhāve vā pramāṇavyāpāraḥ kiṃnimitta ekapakṣānurāgaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3136: ‘dṛṣṭipūtaṃ padaṃ nyaset'; iti kīṭakaṇṭakādyabhāve 'pramite kathaṃ tannyāsaḥ? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3140: prāgapi ca bhūbhāgaparicchedāt prasajyeta, yasya kasyacidvastvantarasya paricchittervidyamānatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3146: na cāpariccheda eva jijñāsyaḥ, svataḥ siddhatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3161: atha yatra pravṛttiḥ syāttatra kevalasaṃvidaḥ // MBs_2.44 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3162: jijñāseta na sūkṣmārthaṃ kaivalyaṃ saṃvido yadi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3163: kevalo viṣayo neṣṭo rūponmiśre 'pi tadyataḥ // MBs_2.45 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3166: yatra bhūbhāgādau caraṇanyāsādilakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ, tasya kevalasya sā jñānāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3169: yadi vijñānasya, pramite 'pi bhūbhāgādau sthūle sūkṣmakīṭakaṇṭakādibhāvābhāvaparīkṣā na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3172: svarūpeṇa vā viṣayasya kaivalyam, viśeṣaṇayogena vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3173: tatra na tāvatsvarūpeṇa, miśre 'pi tasya bhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3175: yato nānyābhāvādviśeṣaṇamanyādṛśaṃ kiñciddṛśyate, yadviśeṣaṇaṃ vastu kevalaṃ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3177: mānābhāvaṃ yadi kṣuṇṇaṃ meyābhāvasya tatra kim /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3184: yadyevaṃ pramāṇābhāvo viṣaya uktaḥ syāt ‘nāsti'; iti dhīśabdayoḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3204: yadi khalvadarśane viparyayadarśanabhramo bhavati suṣuptādyavasthāsu viśvābhāvadarśanabhramaḥ syādālokādarśanabhramavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3207: āropasya viṣayaṃ purovarti vastu āropaṇīyaṃ ca rajataṃ jñānenānāpnuvan na rajatabhramavān bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3209: na ca buddhyabhāvo jñānasya viṣayo na vyavahārābhāvaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3214: [KKS_95] astu vā mānayogyatvaṃ sattvaṃ tacca pramīyatām // MBs_2.51 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3224: ye 'pi pramāṇayogyatāṃ sattāmāhurna tadvyatirekiṇīm, te 'pi nātrāntarārthasaṃsparśamicchanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3227: yadā vacaḥ pramāṇayogyatāyāṃ paryavasitaṃ na viśiṣṭārthasattvaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3233: pramāṇāntarabhinnārthamapi mānaṃ na no vacaḥ // MBs_2.53 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3238: na khalu pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthamapi vaco na pramāṇam, pramāṇameva hyāptavākyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3239: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ sāpekṣamiti cet, ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3243: evamayaṃ puruṣo veda'iti ca pratīteḥ puruṣajñānāpekṣam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3245: kathaṃ tarhi puruṣavacaḥ kiñcidabādhitārthamapi sāpekṣatvenāpramāṇaṃ kathyate? ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3247: yadapekṣaṃ tvasyārthe prāmāṇyaṃ yatsiddhimukhena taṃ sādhayati tatra pramāṇāṃśe bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3256: āptavacaḥ punarnārthe nāpi pramāṇāṃśe saṃbhavatpramāṇagocaraṃ bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3257: pramāṇāṃśe cānapekṣaṃ tanmukhena cārthasiddhiṃ vidadhannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3263: evaṃ ca pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthatve 'pi vedāntavacasāṃ na prāmāṇyavyāhatiḥ, āptavākyavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3273: [KKS_97] na hi pūrvāvamarśena vinā sāmānyakalpanā // MBs_2.59 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3275: avamarśo dṛṣṭasatastathā na hi sadantare // MBs_2.60 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3283: ko nu pūrvāvamarśo 'yaṃ pūrvarūpānvayo dhiyaḥ // MBs_2.61 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3285: sarvātmanā tvanugamo na dṛṣṭaḥ khaṇḍamuṇḍayoḥ // MBs_2.62 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3289: na dṛṣṭamallakasyāsti maṇike khalu tādṛśaḥ // MBs_2.64 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3292: tatra yadi pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, so 'styeva sadantare mātrayā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3300: na viśeṣamātreṇa saṃvedyānvayirūpapratyākhyānaṃ yujyate, gotvāderapi tatsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3301: na hi devadattasya dvitīyadarśane yādṛśo rūpānugamaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3305: na ca tāvatā mṛjjātihīnatā tayoḥ, kiñcittulyatayāvabhāsamānatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3307: pūrvāvamarśaḥ sa iti prakhyetyapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3308: maṇikaṃ vīkṣitavataḥ so 'pi nodeti mallake // MBs_2.65 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3310: so 'yam'ityabhedamavagamayantī bhinneṣvapi sāmānyakalpanāheturbuddhiḥ pūrvāvamarśa ityucyata ityetadapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3315: api ca dṛṣṭamaṇikasya mallake na bhavati drāgiva ‘saḥ'ityanusandhānaṃ khaṇḍamuṇḍavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3318: tulye tarhi sāmānyayoge kasmātkvacit ‘saḥ'ityavamarśaḥ nānyatra? ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3330: na ca viśiṣṭabuddheḥ prāk (sadbuddheḥ prāk --edition) pramāṇagrahaṇaṃ tatkālaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3334: yadi tarhi na pramāṇayogo 'styarthaḥ, kathaṃ tatkālānuvidhāyinī kālapravṛttirastyarthe ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3337: na ca ‘kriyāmantareṇa na saṃsargaḥ padārthānām'; iti śabdārthanayavidāmavigānamityāha ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3340: ‘rājño 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ'phalitā ete vanaspatayaḥ'iti kriyārahiteṣvapi saṃsargaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3342: yato na nirjñātarājasaṃbandhasya puruṣasya phalavatāṃ ca vanaspatīnāṃ satteha pratipādyā gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3344: kiṃ tu puruṣasya rājasaṃbandhe, drumāṇā ca phalasaṃbandhe ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3349: so 'sti'; ‘ye ca phalitāḥ te santi'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3353: athāpi na kriyārahitaṃ vākyamasti kriyāyāṃ ca sāpekṣatā, tathāpi na doṣa ityāha ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3361: tathā ca śrutayaḥ kāścidevameva brahma pratipādayanti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3363: sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante';
GSP33mbrahsiu:3365: yathāgneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranti evamevāsmādātmanaḥ sarve devāḥ'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3396: tadabhāve tvasaṃbhavādyeyaṃ viśiṣṭārthagatirucyate sā bhrāntiḥ, samabhivyāhārāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3403: anadhigataṃ hi śroturarthaṃ bodhayituṃ vacaḥ prayujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3410: tasmādvivakṣāviśeṣasiddhirnāsaṃsṛṣṭeṣu padārtheṣu bhavatīti tathā vivakṣayā prayuktāḥ saṃsṛjyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3414: yato na tattasya pratipādakam, [KKS_102] na prayojakaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3428: atha pramāṇāntareṇopalabhyārthaṃ vivakṣitvā parasmai pratipādayati puruṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3434: atha lokāvagamyatvācchabdasāmarthyasya laukikaprayojakābhāvānna saṃsargaḥ, vidhimattve 'pi na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3439: apūrvo 'pi hi śrotuḥ saṃsargo vaktuḥ pramāṇānumānamukhena satyatāṃ labhate tadasaṃbhave 'satyatvādbuddhādivākyeṣu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3446: kathaṃ nu vidhyadhīnatvaṃ yadi syādanyathā vṛthā // MBs_2.73 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3450: vidhirnaivaṃ kasya hetoratha syādaparaṃ padam // MBs_2.75 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3456: na tāvadvidhiḥ sākṣātsaṃsargasāmānyaṃ tadviśeṣaṃ vā bodhayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3460: na ca loke padaiḥ svārthāḥ svarūpamātraniṣṭhatayaiva pratyyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3472: yadicānyapadārthānāmānarthakyam, vidhyarthasya tanna kasmāt? Atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3486: [KKS_104] śabdādeva mite yo 'pi manyate saṃgatigraham // MBs_2.78 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3487: nānyonyasaṃśrayāvadyaṃ na svayaṃ pramite hi saḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3488: pareṇa śabdāvagate tatpravṛttyā ca sūcite // MBs_2.79 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3517: na khalu bījāṅkurayorivānayorekasya prāthamyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3519: api ca sarvapratipattṝṇāmanumānapūrvā śabdātpratipattiriti teṣāṃ śabdo 'nuvādaka eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3527: na cālaukikaḥ kalpayitumapi śakyaḥ, laukikādapi pravṛttisiddheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3532: tatra laukikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukike viditasaṃbandhe vede 'pi tatpratipattireva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3535: tatra vede laukikānāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmasaṃbhavādalaukikaṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3536: evamapi yaḥ śabdārtho vede sāmānyaṃ sa lokasiddha iti nānuvādatā vyāvartate padārthāntaravat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3537: yo 'pi viśeṣaḥ so 'nyāsaṃbhavena pariśeṣānumānagocara iti na pramāṇāntarāviṣayatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3541: tatra vaidikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukikapravṛttihetvabhāvādalaukike [KKS_106] tu pravṛttihetau vaidikānāṃ vidhāyakānāṃ saṃbandhajñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3545: na ca laukikasyaiva śreyaḥsādhanatvasya saṃbhava iti yuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3547: tatra prayogadarśanālliṅādestadanusāreṇa ca śabdārthāvadhāraṇāt pramāṇāntaragamyatāpi śabdārthānupraveśinī /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3549: bhavatu nāma vedavyavahārādeva śabdārthānugamaḥ, tathāpi na pramāṇāntaragocaratā vyāvartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3551: alaukike pravṛttihetau śabdasya sāmarthyajñānakāle pramito vā syāt, na vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3552: pramitaścet, śabdasaṃbandhasya tadaiva jñāyamānatvādavaśyaṃ pramāṇāntareṇeti vācyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3553: atha na pramitaḥ, kathaṃ tatra saṃbandhajñānam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3554: na hyapramitayoḥ saṃbandhinostadāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pramātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3562: kiṃ pratyayamātre sāmarthyaṃ gṛhyate, atha viśiṣṭe pravṛttihetupratyaye?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3582: tathā na viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ hi tatra yathārthatve tathābhūtagrāhiṇī tatpratītirarthaśūnyā syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3584: parajñānena ca paraḥ pratipadyata iti subhāṣitam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3586: na parajñānena paraḥ pratipadyate, kiṃ tu svajñānenaiva parajñānasāmarthyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3602: na ca vaktṛjñānenaivārthasiddhiḥ, parajñānena na paraḥ pratipadyata ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3605: tattanmithyātve tadasaṃbhave vā pramāṇapratītibādhane 'rthapratīterapi bādhanāttadabādhe cābādhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3607: anyathā pramāṇāntaraparatantraṃ puruṣavaco 'rthe sāpekṣamityetadeva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3608: na hi yo yasyāviṣayaḥ sa tatra sāpekṣo 'napekṣo vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3611: tacca vaktṛdhīhetusaṃbhavādvākyasya, na tu vaktṛdhiya eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3612: śabdasya cārthena saṃbandhaḥ, na tu jñānena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3620: na ca pratītimātre, arthavatyāḥ pratīteḥ smṛtipramāṇayoranyataratrāntargamāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3622: yadi ca śābdapratītivyatirekiṇyāpi pratītyā sa viṣayīkriyate 'pramāṇātmikayāpi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3623: bhavatyayamaśābdasyāpi jñānasya gocara iti pramāṇāntarāśaṅkā kena vāryate?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3626: sati hyanyasmin prayojake 'rthe yasyābhāve na prayogaḥ so 'pi tasya śabdasya prayojaka iti gamyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3627: yathā satsu hetvantareṣu yasyābhāve na kāryaṃ so 'pi heturgamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3632: na tu śreyohetutve sati pramāṇāntaragamyatāyā abhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3635: tatra śreyaḥsādhanatāyāḥ prayojakatvasyāvadhāritatvāt [KKS_109] tadabhāve tannibandhana iti gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3640: tatsadbhāvācca prayoga upapadyata iti na teṣu sāmarthyakalpanā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3644: na hi ya ekatra yasya pramāṇasya gocaraḥ so 'nyatrāpi mithyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3646: tathā yāgādiṣu viprakṛṣṭakālaphaleṣu vedāvagamyaṃ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3647: na ca pramāṇāntarānupalabdhyā pramāṇāntaragamyo bādhyate, viṣayavyavasthayāpi pramāṇapravṛtteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3649: tadaviṣaye tu śabdārthe na tadvirodha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3653: atha mā bhūdānantaryacodanā, mā ca bhūtpramāṇāntarāvagamyatā śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3661: api ca viśiṣṭasiddhau viśeṣaṇamapi śreyohetutvamātraṃ siddham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3672: tadāpi pravṛttipramitastadhetupratyayo na tamantareṇetyāptavacanārthavadanumeyatā na vyāvartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3684: na brūmo vidhiranyathā vṛthā syāditi tadadhīnaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3685: kiṃ tu pramāṇāntmanaiva sa svaśabdena pratipādyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3692: api ca yatrāsya prāmāṇyamiṣyate, śabdasyaiva tatrāstu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3701: kva ca pramāṇameṣo 'rthe na yāgādau svaśabdake // MBs_2.87 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3705: na saṃsargaḥ padārthānāṃ svaśabdaistu prakāśitāḥ // MBs_2.89 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3708: ato na viddhyabhāvena saṃsargo na prakalpate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3713: avidhiṣvapi laukikeṣu vākyeṣu śroturanadhigato 'pūrvaḥ saṃsargaḥ pratīyate ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:3717: anupāyatve hi tasya na sa kāminyā kṛtaḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3719: na hi śabdasya tatra kaścidaparādhaḥ, yena tamatikramyānyatpramāṇaṃ mṛgyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3723: atha vā śabdastatra na duṣyati phalasādhanasāmarthye, niyogastu duṣyatyeva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3726: tasmāt saṃbandhajñānāpekṣatvena padārthāntaraiḥ samānatvādvidhāyakārthasya na śakyaṃ viśeṣeṇa vaktuṃ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3728: sarva eva tu padārthāḥ saṃbandhayogyaiḥ kārakādibhāvaiḥ svapadebhyaḥ pratītāḥ sannikarṣeṇa saṃsṛjyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3730: loke ca [KKS_112] padaiḥ svārthānāṃ pratipādanaṃ sannikarṣeṇa viśiṣṭārthaparatayā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3733: sarve hi te padairaparyavasitarūpāḥ svarūpamātre prakāśyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3734: evaṃ padārthāntaraistulyatvādvidheḥ na viśeṣeṇa tannibandhanaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3735: sarvapadārthanibandhane ca saṃsarge na vidhyabhāvena saṃsargo nopapadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3737: kathaṃ nopāsanīyaḥ, yadā niyogaparatayaiva padānāṃ svārtheṣu saṃsargajñānam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3738: pravartakavacanāntarapravṛttidarśanena hi taddhetupratyayamanumāya tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3741: ‘caitragṛhe kṛśānuḥ'; iti, tadā tatastenānayanaṃ dṛṣṭvā gamyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3742: ‘ihānenāgnisattā pratītā, sā cāsmādvākyāt'; na ca śakyaṃ vaktum ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3744: agnisattāmātrapratyayena vākyātpravṛttisiddherna vākyasya niyojane 'pi sāmarthyaṃ śakyate kalpayitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3745: arthāntarānvaye ca prayogapratyayopapattau na viśeṣānvaye pramāṇam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3749: pratipattividhau tulyaṃ yadi saiva prayojanam // MBs_2.92 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3752: hanta tarhi svarupe tanna vacaḥ paryavasati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3813: na hi vrīhyādisvarūpagrāhi pramāṇaṃ prayogaikadeśatāṃ bhajate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3816: [KKS_115] idānīṃ tṛtīyapratipattigocaro vidhiḥ parāsyate, tattvāvabodhaviṣayatvena saṃbandhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3817: dvitīyapratipattiviṣayo hi na tattvāvabodhaviṣayaḥ, kiṃ tu tadabhyāsaviṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3823: svātmasthitiḥ supraśāntā phalaṃ tanna vidheḥ padam // MBs_2.103 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3834: tasya ca viṣayo nānāpadārthasaṃsargātmā, tadanugamena pratīteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3835: tajjñānasya ca vividhārthamātrasaṃbhedāvabhāsasyātmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dvaitaleśenāpyanavamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ gocaraḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3837: yato yo 'sāvadvayo dvaitaleśasaṃsparśavikala ātmatattvabodhaḥ so 'vacchedavibhrāntivirahāttasya svarūpāvasthānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3845: tathā ca tatsvarūpasthitirviśvāśivopaśamānniratiśayāhlādāvāpteśca suṣṭhu praśāntāparaḥ puruṣārthaḥ phalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3848: na ca puruṣārthe 'pyajñātopāye na pravartata iti yuktam, yataḥ pravṛtteḥ pūrvarūpamicchā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3851: tathā ‘yo hi yadicchati sa tatkaroti'; ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3852: api ca ajñātopāye cenna pravartate, avaśyamupāyajñāpanayā tatra pravartyaḥ phalamuddiśya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3853: tāvatā ca tatrāpi pravṛttisiddherna vidhāyakasya tatra vyāpāra āśrayitavyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3857: nanu phalavatyapyarthalakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ, kva tarhi vidhivyāpāraḥ? itthaṃbhāve /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3870: ataḥ sā śabdapramāṇikā satī vidhiriti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3888: na hi pratītimātreṇa ghaṭādayaḥ pravṛttihetava ityādi varṇitaṃ vidhiviveke /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3896: niyukto 'smi'iti yato buddhiḥ sa niyogo vidhiśabdaparyāya iti, taṃ pratyucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3905: na hi taṃ parityajya laukikamalaukikakalpane pramāṇamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3921: sa hi niyoktṛdharmaḥ svatantro vā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3925: evamapi na tasyāṃ śabdaḥ pramāṇam,sākṣāttasya niyogābhidhāyitvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3930: tathā hi ‘gaurduhyatāṃ tvayā'; iti niyoge anyena dugdhāyāṃ na punardohamārabhate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3942: sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3951: na ca mokṣaḥ phalaṃ tasya sādhyo mokṣo na cāparaḥ // MBs_2.105 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3953: vidyaiva cādvayā śāntā tadastamaya ucyate // MBs_2.106 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3956: iti darśanāt, sa prāgabhāvo na sādhyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3957: atha brahmaprāptiḥ, sā caitragrāmayoriva vā syājjīvabrahmaṇormārgaśrutibhyaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3958: 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhi nissṛtaikā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3964: yathā vā madhuni nānākusumarasānāṃ samudre ca nadīnāṃ prāptiravibhāgalakṣaṇā tathā syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3965: ‘yathā loke madhukṛto madhu kurvanti'; iti'; ‘yathā somyemā nadyaḥ'; iti darśanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3967: ‘tathā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3970: sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati';
GSP33mbrahsiu:3992: na caturthaḥ, ananyatvādeva, caitanyasya ca brahmarūpasyāviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3993: atha vijñānātmanāṃ śokamohādyabhāvo viśiṣyata iti cettatrāpi śokādayaścedātmāno vijñānātmanām, anucchedyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3994: atha guṇā arthāntaramāgamāpāyinaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ, kṣaṇikatvādeva cocchidyanta iti na tatsādhanamapekṣyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3997: tatprāptistadrūpapariṇāmo mokṣaḥ, ‘sa svarāḍ bhavati'; iti śruteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3999: brahmaṇo nyūnaṃ samaṃ vā vijñānātmanām [KKS_121] aiśvaryaṃ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4005: ‘atha ye 'nyathāto viduḥ, anyarājānaste kṣayyalokā bhavanti'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4008: ekaścetsarvādhipatiḥ sarvasya praśāsitā, paraḥ kiṃ kurvannīśaḥ syāt? virodhācca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4013: kāryāsiddhaścedaikamatye hetuḥ pariṣadvat, anyathā tasyāsiddheriti cet, pratyekamanīśvaratvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4027: tadevaṃ svarūpasthitilakṣaṇatvānmohasya na kāryatā, prāgapi svarūpasya bhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4029: na cānyatvam, yato 'vidyāpagama evoktena prakāreṇa muktiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4031: vidyaiva cāvidyānivṛttiḥ yadyagrahaṇamavidyā, yato bhāva [KKS_122] evābhāvavyāvṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4032: atha viparyāsaḥ, tathāpi virodhitatattvajñānodaya eva tannivṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4033: na hi śuktikājñānotpādādanyā rajatajñānanivṛttistatsādhyā prayatnāntarasādhyā vā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4039: tasmāttatsarvamabhavat'; ‘tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ'; veda -- bhavati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4044: na, ekasyāpi vastuno bhāvābhāvarūpeṇa vyapadeśāt, tathā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4045: ‘yadā ghaṭo naśyati tadā kapālāni jāyante'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4050: atraiva samavanīyante'; iti prāṇānutkramaṇena vijñānātmana evāgatirucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4051: na hi tadagamane tadupādhestasya brahmaṇo bhedena vijñānātmatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4052: yatra tu ‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ'; iti sopādhyupāsyam, tadviṣayāstāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4055: araśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyāmito [KKS_123] divi tadairaṃmadīyaṃ sarastadaśvatthaḥ somasavanastadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśma'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4057: ‘ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyaṃ tapa ityupāsate'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4061: iti, tathā ‘tameva viditvāti mṛtyumeti'; iti vacanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4071: tasmin parāmṛtāḥ parabrahmarūpeṇāmṛtāḥ santaḥ saṃnyāsayogādbhedena parameśvare svakṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalānāṃ ca saṃnyāsādyogācca sarvamidaṃ kartrādi brahma ityupāsanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4076: yathā candraloke yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā sthita eva tasmin bhuktabhogā āvartante naivaṃ sthita eva brahmaloke tata āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4078: tatpralaye hi na tata āvṛtto bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4080: tathā ca ‘imaṃ mānavamāvartaṃ nāvartante'; iti ‘imam(?, im edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:4090: ato 'vikṛtasya niyatadeśasya brahmaṇaḥ prāptaye yujyate mārgaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4095: madhunadīnidarśanāvibhāgaśrutirapi vivekajñānābhāvaparā, na tu tadvidha evāvibhāgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4100: kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4105: tatra yadyaparastejaḥprabhṛtitattvasargaḥ satyatayā vidhīyeta, vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4107: viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādīni vacāṃsi [KKS_125] vākyabhedadoṣātpṛthagvidhitvamalabhamānāni tādarthyāttadānukūlyena stutyarthatayā vyavatiṣṭhante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4113: ekatvapratipattestu dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ ca phalaṃ śokādinivṛttaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4115: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ'; iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4122: nanvevaṃ mukhya eva kāryakāraṇabhāva uktaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4124: na khalvatra kāryakāraṇabhāva eva pratipādyaḥ, yenāsau yathāśabdaṃ mukhya eva gṛhyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4128: ‘ekamevādvitīyam'iti punaḥ punaḥ śruteḥ sarvabhedanirāsaparatvānna śakyaṃ vaktum ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4130: ‘tatsatyam, sa ātmā'; iti ca kāraṇasyaiva satyatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4131: anyatra ca'; ‘indro māyābhiḥ'; iti bhedasya māyāgamyatvaśruteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4137: yathā hi na bimbātpratibimbānāmutpattirnānārūpāṇām, bimbopādānamātratayā pratibimbabhedavikalpasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4138: na hi bimbāt [KKS_126] parasparato vā vyāvṛttāni kānicidvastūni pratibimbāni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4140: tathā na varṇebhyaḥ padavākyaprakaraṇādīni kānicidvastūni santi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4144: ‘na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4147: svayameva ‘vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam'; iti vikārāsatyatayā na pāramārthikītyuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4157: yadapi kvacidapunarāvṛttiśravaṇam, tasyāpi dvayī gatirvyākhyātetyekaṃ darśanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4176: tathā ca yatkiñcidīśvaratvaṃ yacca vijñānaṃ yaścānando brahmādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu bhūteṣu brahmaṇi tāni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4180: nanu prapañcaśūnyasyādvaitasya brahmarūpasya jñeyābhāvādīśitavyābhāvācca vijñānamaiśvaryaṃ cānupapannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4184: kiṃ tu siddhena jñānarūpeṇa siddhayā ceśanaśaktyā jñeyamavāpnoti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4185: īśitavyaṃ ca viniyuṅkte praśāsti ca prakāśadāhavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4186: siddhena hi prakāśarūpeṇa prakāśyaṃ prakāśayati vivasvān /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4187: na tu prakāśyādhīnaṃ tasya prakāśarūpam, dāhyādhīnā vā agnerdāhaśaktiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4193: evaṃ ca ‘eṣa bhūtādhipatiḥ'; ‘eṣa lokapālaḥ'iti brahmendrayamādīnāṃ caiśvaryamuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4195: kāmeṣvānandaprāptyā kāmā āptā bhavanti, na svarūpeṇa /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4196: evaṃ ‘sa tatra paryeti jakṣan krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhirvā'; iti varṇanīyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4202: ato yatra yatra nātyantamavacchedaḥ samutkarṣātteṣāṃ tāni tāni pratyāsatterbhūtānyātmatvena bhagavānuktvā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4211: na hi svamahimapratiṣṭhasya parasya deśaviśeṣāvarodhaḥ, sarvaviśeṣātigasya ca rūpaviśeṣayogaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4213: ‘uditaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyaḥ'; iti, ādhyānaṃ tu tathā vidhīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4217: tasmānna sādhyo mokṣaḥ, na ca vidyayā anya iti puṣkalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4222: śrūyate ca tasya phalaṃ bandhahetūnāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4225: tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyeta evaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante';
GSP33mbrahsiu:4230: naitaṃ setumahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na duṣkṛtam';
GSP33mbrahsiu:4235: na cādattaphalasya karmaṇo na kṣayaḥ, prāyaścittānāṃ doṣasaṃyogena codyamānānāṃ tatkṣayaphalatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4247: avidyādhyastāni hi karmāṇi tatsamucchede vidyayā samucchinnānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4252: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4253: nanvevaṃ karmakṣayāmyupagame tattvadarśanasamanantarameva muktiḥ syāt, na dehapātapratīkṣā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4254: ‘tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣe 'tha saṃpatsye'; iti dehapātapratīkṣāśrutirbādhyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4255: yasya tu vidyā tatkṣayasādhanaṃ śāstrādgamyate tasya [KKS_130] tadanusāreṇa keṣāñcitkṣayo vidyayā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4264: ‘anārabdhakārye eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ'; ‘bhogena tvitare kṣapayitvā saṃpadyate'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4267: na hīyaṃ śrutiścirakālatāviśiṣṭaṃ dehapātavadhiṃ mukterāha, kiṃ tu kṣipratām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4278: yadi kasyacicciram, tāvadeva yāvanna vimokṣye iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4279: nanu pūrvasmin pakṣe tattvajñānānantaratvāddehapātasya sthitaprajñalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ na yujyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4283: sthitaprajñastāvanna vigalitanikhilāvidyaḥ siddhaḥ, kiṃ tu sādhaka evāvasthāviśeṣaṃ prāptaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4286: kiṃ tu ārabdhakāryakarmakṣayaṃ [KKS_131] bhogena pratīkṣata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4289: yathā rajjvāṃ sarpasamāropasamutthabhayajanmāno vepathuprabhṛtayastattvadarśanādapāvṛte bhaye kasyacittadaiva nivartante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4296: tathā ca ‘tāvadeva ciram'; iti śrutyā virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4297: athocchedādavidyāyā nānuvṛttiḥ, kṣaṇamapi na syāditi sa eva virodhaḥ, saiṣobhayataḥpāśā rajjuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4305: tata eva hi sa krameṇa nivartate, svayameva vā kulālacakrabhrāntisaṃskāravat ---
