GSP33mbrahsiu:4306: tathā nivṛttāyāmavidyāyāṃ karmasu cāviśeṣeṇārabdhakāryeṣvanārabdhakāryeṣu ca nivṛtteṣvārabdhavipākasaṃskārāccharīriṇaṃ bhoktāramiva cāyamātmānaṃ pratyetyābhāsamātreṇa vidvānapi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4308_0: sa cāyamīdṛśaḥ sthitaprajño varṇitaḥ vītakāma ātmarūpasaṃtuṣṭo duḥkheṣu cchāyāmātrarūpeṣu
GSP33mbrahsiu:4309: yathā khalvaviduṣo mṛddāruracite stryādau viṣaye chāyāmātradarśanamabhiniveśavikalam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4310: tathā viduṣaḥ kṣīṇakarmāvidyasya [KKS_132] tatsaṃskāramātrāddarśanaṃ chāyāmātreṇaiva viṣayeṣu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4312: tadyathāhinirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā pratyastā śayīta evamevedaṃ śarīram'iti viduṣaḥ śarīre 'nāsthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4316: tattvadarśanādeva krameṇa tasyāpi nivṛtteḥ, svayameva vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4319: tadanuvṛttau dehapāta eva na syāditi na dehapātottarakāle tadvipākasya chāyāmātreṇāpi darśanaṃ śakyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4320: yena hi karmaṇā yaccharīramārabdhaṃ tatraiva tadvipākaśeṣābhāsaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4335: pravṛttabhogānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pravṛttavegasyeṣoriva cakrasyeva vā na śakyaḥ pratibandhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4337: tadasat, [KKS_133] śakyo hīṣuḥ pratibandhuṃ kuḍyādibhiḥ, nāśayituṃ ca cchedādibhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4341: tatra kathaṃ sarvāvidyāpravilayaḥ, kathaṃ vā na cchedyamavaśiṣyate? ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4345: viśuddhaṃ khalvātmānaṃ sākṣādanubhavato vipākābhāsastamaspṛśannakiñcitkaro bandhātmā pralīna eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4347: tathāvadātamātmānaṃ jānato viparītaṃ vā khaḍgādiṣu śyāmādyābhāsa utpanno 'pi tattvadarśanādavakāśamalabhamānaḥ pravilīna eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4348: tathā ca na tannibandhanena malinatvena śocatyātmānam, na tejasvitayābhinandati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4351: karmaṇo vā śarīrasthitiḥ syātsaṃskārādvā, ko viśeṣaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4354: tasmāt ‘bhogena tvitare kṣapayitvā saṃpadyate'; ityeva yuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4362: ‘yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ'; /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4374: tathā ca taddravyaṃ paramārthatiktamivānavasitamādhuryamiva duḥkhāya bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4375: upāsanādinā sākṣātkṛtātmatattvasya tu virodhātsannapi prapañcāvabhāso nātmasaṃsparśī,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4377: ‘siṃho devadattaḥ'; iti samārope 'vabhāsamāno 'pi tadasaṃsparśī, akiñcitkaraḥ, na bhayahetuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4379: śābdaṃ tu pramāṇādhīnaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ jñānam, tatra punarapi viparyayāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4380: dṛṣṭaṃ hi pramāṇānanusandhāne punaḥ sarpabhrāntyā rajjorbhayam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4382: kimanyadupāsanamasmāt? tasmādbandhahetucchedo 'pi vidyaiva, na tayā sādhyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4385: yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate'iti kartṛkarmapravibhāgasya vidyayā pravilayāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4389: na brahma śabdadhīgamyaṃ yadyaśakyo dhiyo vidhiḥ // MBs_2.108 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4399: api ca jñānaviśeṣavidhivādina ātmatattve prāmāṇyameva hīyata iti darśayati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4405: sattānvayāttu tatsiddhiḥ pratyuteti sa duṣyati // MBs_2.112 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4409: yadi tāvanniyogasyaiva kāryatā pratīyeta, tadā sa svaniṣpattau paryavasitaḥ saha śabdena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4416: iti padānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena sambandhādanyathā vā vastutattvapratipattiriti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4420: evamidaṃ pratipattavyam'iti kartavyatāniṣṭhā na vastutattve pramāṇaṃ vṛttānteṣvivārthavādotthajñānam, anyaparatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4429: na hi ‘yajeta'ityukte yāgasya bhūtakālā vartamānakālā bhaviṣyatkālā vā sattā pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4436: aṅgadī kuṇḍalī vyūḍhorasko devadattasya putro 'dhīte'ityadhyayanakriyāvatsarvo viśeṣaṇakalāpaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4439: pratipattirhi viṣayaviṣeśaviśiṣṭā pramīyamāṇā na viṣayaviśeṣasya sadbhāvaṃ gamayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4441: asau vāva loko gautamāgniḥ'iti yathā dyuprabhṛtiṣvanagnidṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4443: nanu no viparītārthā dhīḥ pratītivirodhataḥ // MBs_2.114 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4445: na khalvanyadanyathā pratīyata iti yuktam, pratītivirodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4447: viṣayarūpavyabhicāriṇi jñāne na tato viṣayaniścayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4451: kiṃ tarhīdaṃ śuktisaṃnikṛṣṭe cakṣuṣi ‘rajatam'; iti? smṛtiḥ, sāmānyagrahaṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4457: naitanna hi pravarteta śuktikāśakale tadā // MBs_2.115 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4464: na tatra yadi tadbuddhiḥ śuktikāśakale 'pi na /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4474: yadi cakṣuṣā saṃprayuktaṃ śuktiśakalaṃ ‘na rajatam'; iti pratīyāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4478: na ca smaryamāṇe rajate sā pravṛttiḥ, taddeśāsaṃnidheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4479: na hi pratītimupagate 'pi vastuni yatra tasyāsaṃnidhistatra tenārthī pravartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4490: atha na teṣu rajatāvagamaḥ, itaratrāpi na /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4492: athādṛṣṭatvādevādṛṣṭeṣu na pravartate, śuktāvapi na pravarteta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4493: nanu yattu tathā rajatarūpam, na tenāvagamaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4494: sa yathā cakṣuṣāsaṃprayuktasya nāsti, tathā saṃprayuktāyā api śukteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4503: na hīndriyasaṃyogasya darśanasya vā kaścidagraha upayogaḥ, abhūtasamārope tvasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4512: ekatvameva smarataḥ prāgrūpaṃ śaśini sphuṭam // MBs_2.127 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4515: viparyayo na hi bhavedbhavanvā salile bhavet /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4518: smṛtijñānasya svarūpameva tādṛśaṃ yatpramātavyādbhedenāvabhāsayati, svarūpamātraniṣṭhaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4519: tatra pūrvasmin smaraṇagocarayoravivekaḥ kutaḥ, svajñānādeva viviktatvāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4520: itarasminnapi sadā smṛtau viparyayaḥ syāt, sāmānyadarśane cānyasmṛtāvavivekāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4528: yadi ca pratyakṣe 'rthe viśeṣajñānātsmaryamāṇaṃ vivicyate, na svajñānāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4529: asati tatra viśeṣajñāne ca dvayoḥ smṛtau saṃśaya eva syāt, naikāvabhāso viparyayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4533: sāmānyadarśane 'pi kadācidekāṃ koṭiṃ smarato na saṃśayo na viparyayaḥ, doṣāṇāmapuṣṭeḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4534: ataḥ svajñānādeva tadā smṛtaṃ vivicyate, na dṛśyaviśeṣaparicchedāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4536: [KKS_140] api ca anyadeva smarataḥ pūrvarūpamekatvaṃ śaśini dvitvavibhramaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4541: na ca sarvā niyogena bhrāntiḥ sādṛśyabandhanā // MBs_2.129 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4543: kiñcitsādṛśyato hi syānna kaścittatra na bhramaḥ // MBs_2.130 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4545: bhrameṣu niyamo doṣādagrahe na bhrame yamaḥ // MBs_2.131 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4546: yadi ca sadṛśadarśanātsadṛśasmṛterbhramaḥ, kathaṃ śvete pītabhramaḥ madhure vā tiktabhrāntiḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4551: agrahamātre tu doṣavyāpāre kāmilādidoṣādbhrāntiniyamo na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4564: sarvajñānāni mithyā ca prasajyante 'tra kalpane // MBs_2.137 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4571: sato tu viśeṣagrahaṇa indriyasaṃyukte sāmānyadarśane 'pi nāvivekaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4574: evamapi dvayoḥ smaraṇe na viparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4576: atha deśakālaviśeṣātsmaryamāṇaṃ vivicyate, tatra deśakālabhedāgraha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4577: tanna, anantadeśakālabhedāvagataṃ taddeśāvagataṃ ca dṛśyātsmaryamāṇaṃ viviktaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4578: na ca deśakālabhedagrahaṇāt, anantasmaraṇānupapatteḥ, taddeśāvagate ca deśabhedābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4581: paripūrṇaiva tarhi smṛtiḥ, na tayā svaviṣayasya kiñcinna gṛhītam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4582: svayameva sā svaviṣayaṃ dṛśyādvivinaktīti nāsti dṛśyamānasmaryamāṇayoravivekaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4583: yataḥ smarāmi iti jñānamanyadeva darśanasmaraṇavivekakāri smṛteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4585: smṛtiḥ svaviṣayaṃ vivinakti vā na vā? yadi vivinakti, tadā viparyayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4586: atha na smṛtiḥ svaviṣayaṃ vivinakti, tadā sāmānyadarśane cānyasmṛtau viparyayaḥ syādityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4590: na cetsmṛteḥ pramāṇakāryātkāryaṃ viviktaṃ syāt, kena sā viviktā gamyeta?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4591: satyapi smṛtiviveke dṛṣṭaḥ pratyabhijñābhramaḥ ‘sa eva'; iti na ca pratyakṣasyāvivekaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4596: athāsaṃnidhyagrahaṇāt, bhavatu sa svapnajñāne, natvindriyajāyāṃ bhrāntau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4600: na hi kasyacijjñānasya sarvātmanā vastu viṣaya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4601: satyapi ca vivekajñāne pramāṇāntarād dvicandradiṅmohādyanugatirdṛṣṭeti nāgrahaṇamātraṃ viparyayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4604: ye ca khyātī tu rajataścakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastunoḥ // MBs_2.140 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4610: na krame yaugapadye vā vivekamatirīdṛśī // MBs_2.143 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4625: viparītā tu khyātiḥ saṃnihitasya rajatatāmabhūtāṃ rajatasya vā saṃnihitatāmādarśayantī prasañjayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4630: na hi ‘nedaṃ rajatam'iti rajatamātraṃ cakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastumātraṃ vā nirasyamānamavasyāmaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4631: kiṃ tu cakṣuḥsaṃyuktasya tu rajatatāṃ rajatasya vā cakṣusaṃyuktām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4635: sarvajñānānāmagrahabādhenotpattau ca vivekajñānamātramidaṃ na prasaktapratiṣedharūpamiti pratītyanusāriṇo 'nurūpam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4646: nanu sāmānyadarśane na cedviparyayaḥ, saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4649: na hyasati koṭidvayasmaraṇe sāmānyadarśane 'pi saṃśayaḥ, na ca viparyayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4650: bhavati hi puro 'vasthite bhāsvararūpamātrapratītiḥ, rajate ca smṛtiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4651: na ca tayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate, naikatvaṃ ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4660: na hi sā tattvajñāne satyudeti, virodhāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4666: smṛtatvenāviviktasya tathā viveke dharmiṇi pratipanne dharmāntarapratipanne dharmāntarapratipatterbādhakatvaṃ pūrvasyāśca bhrāntitvaṃ syātāmiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4667: yaḥ pratītivirodhastu sa svadoṣa udāhṛtaḥ // MBs_2.149 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4669: 'idaṃ śuklaṃ rajatam'iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīterātmopālambhaḥ parasminnāsajyate pratītivirodhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4674: yo hi jñāyamāne 'rthe 'nyathāpi syādityanāśvāsastasya tenaiva jñānena tathātvaparicchedinotpattirnirudhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4683: vyabhicāravato 'pi ca sitāsitādiṣu cakṣuṣaḥ sati tasmin prāmāṇyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4684: na ca vyabhicāro bādhaheturdoṣavat prāmāṇyopaghātī kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4688: na [KKS_145] tatra vyabhicārādaprāmāṇyam, api tu paricchedakāryābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4691: yatra tvavyabhicāro na kāraṇaṃ tatra vyabhicāre 'pi sati paricchede prāmāṇyamavivādam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4692: akṣeṣu tadvadeva ca jñānaṃ paricchedanimittam, na liṅgavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4699: ya eva tvavyabhicāramarthayate jñānasyāśvāsārthaṃ tasyaivānāśvāsaḥ, avyabhicārajñāne 'pyanāśvāsāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4702: api ca jñānarūpāccennārthāśvāsaḥ, tasyāsiddhau kena sahāvyabhicāro jñānasya gṛhyeta?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4703: kiṃ ca jñānarūpādevāvyabhicāro 'pi kathyate, viparītakhyātau tadvirodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4704: tathā sati tadeva viṣayasya sādhakam, vyartho 'vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4715: pratyakṣaṃ kāryamevaṃ ca hetunānumitaṃ bhavet // MBs_2.156 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4727: kasyacittvarpaṇaṃ tulyamatha tatra na tattathā // MBs_2.158 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4728: parasyāpi hi tatraivamatha tatra tathā sthiteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4729: sarvatra syāttathābhāvaḥ syādevaṃ grahaṇe 'pi te // MBs_2.159 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4736: atha kāniciccakṣuḥsaṃyuktāni vastūni svena rūpeṇa gṛhyanta iti kasyacidagrahaṇe 'pi nānālambanatvam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4739: athāgrahaṇe naiva cakṣuḥsaṃyuktasyālambanatvamiṣyate, paro 'pi naiva viparyaya icchati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4744: yathā khalu viparyayajñāne cakṣuḥsaṃprayuktavastusvabhāvanirapekṣatā dṛṣṭā samyagjñāne 'pi śaṅkyate jñānatvasāmānyāttathā cakṣuḥsaṃprayuktamapi vastu nāvikalarūpaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4748: doṣābhāvāditi cet, viparyaye 'pi tulyam, na cānyathālambane nirālambanatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4750: ālambanārthaśca rajatavyavahārayogyatā śukteḥ, tathā hi rajatārthī tāmādatte /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4751: ghaṭasyāpi hi naivānyatsvajñānālambanatvamanyatra vyavahārayogyatāyāḥ, yato na viṣayākāraṃ jñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4752: tatra śuktiḥ svarūpeṇa nālambitā rajatajñānena, tannibandhanavyavahārabhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4760: adṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā na ca dṛṣṭasya saṃbhave /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4774: ‘evaṃvidhātmoddeśena jñānaṃ kuryāt'; na tu ‘evaṃvidha ātmā'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4776: na hi tatrākiñcitkarasya tādarthyena kartavyatā yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4777: jñānasya ca karmaṇi nānyatphalaṃ tadrūpasaṃvitteḥ, na hi tasyāṃ dṛṣṭāyāmanyasyādṛṣṭasya kalpanā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4781: na hi tatra kiñcidakurvatprokṣaṇaṃ tadarthaṃ kṛtaṃ syādityevaṃ vidherevādṛṣṭasaṃskārasadbhāvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4783: nānyathā svargakāmasya yāgakartavyatāpratītiryujyate yadi na svargopāyo yāgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4784: anupāye cenniyujyate, na svargakāmo niyukto bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4785: anuṣṭhito 'pi na svargakāmenānuṣṭhito bhavatīti kriyāviṣayādapi vidheḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamaḥ śābdaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4787: na hi tadvidhamātmānamuddiśyajñānaniyogo yujyate, atadvidhaścedātmā tena jñānena pratīyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4789: jñānaṃ pradarśitaṃ na syādanyathā tadvidheḥ phalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4790: layo nivartyo na tathā vikṣepo hi yathāsukhaḥ // MBs_2.166 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4794: na dṛṣṭamātrād dṛṣṭārthaṃ puruṣārthānugaṃ tu tat // MBs_2.168 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4802: taccāvabhāsanaṃ svarūpeṇa ca dṛṣṭam, pararūpeṇa ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4807: tattvapratipattiravaśyābhyupeyā, nātasmiṃstatkhyātiḥ? anyathā nātmajñānavidhiḥ phalavān syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4810: yadi ca nātmano nāmarūpaprapañcarūpeṇa prakāśanam, kiṃ pravilāpyeta? atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4815: yato nācchādikāyā avidyāyā nivṛttiḥ puruṣeṇārthyate tathā yathā vikṣepasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4817: layastu vividhaduḥkhanivṛtterasakṛdānandatvena śrutau gītaḥ pratyutārthanīyaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4818: api ca viparyāsamanicchato 'vidyābheda eva na syāt, avasthātraye 'pyagrahaṇamātratvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4823: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhastu dvau tu turye na sidhyataḥ'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4828: abhinnasya vastuno 'pradeśasya grahaṇe tathābhāvasya cāgrahaṇātpṛthaktvena pratyavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4830: yadi tāvadasamyaggrahaṇamātraṃ tadapaṭutvaṃ vā jñānasya kenaciddrūpeṇa vā grahaṇam, na sarvātmanā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4831: tatra dūrasthe sūkṣme ca bhavatyapaṭu jñānaṃ sāmānyajñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4833: na ca kiñcijjñānaṃ sarvātmanārthasya grāhakamiti sarvajñānamithyātvāpātaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4841: na brūmaḥ pṛthak prakāśate, kiṃ tu pṛthagiva prakāśata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4843: yadi yathā pṛthagbhūtamaprakāśamānaikatvaṃ prakāśate tathaikamapyātmatattvamagṛhyamāṇaikatvaṃ prakāśata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4844: kenacidaṃśena grahaṇaṃ sarvātmanā cāgrahaṇamuktaṃ bhavati, tatra coktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4845: atha prakāśata iva, na tu prakāśate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4851: tadasat, agrahaṇasyābhāvasya svarūpeṇa pararūpeṇa vā grahaṇānabhyupagamāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4853: abhinne ca bhedābhimānaṃ parityajyābhedāgrahaṇe bhedagrahābhimānamūrīkurvatā kiṃ parihṛtaṃ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4860: na yasya kasyaciddarśanād dṛṣṭārthatā, kiṃ tu puruṣārthasaṃsparśinaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4863: yathā hi viśuddhamadvaitamātmānaṃ pratipadyamānastathābhūto na śokena saṃspṛśyate, śocanīyābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4865: na kvaciddrajyati kiñcid dveṣṭi vā, viṣayābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4869: idameva cātra yujyate, pratyakṣādīnāmavirodhāt, karmavidhīnāṃ ca bhūtārthatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4870: paramārthe hi prapañcaśūnyatve pratyakṣādīni pramāṇāni bādhyeran /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4885: asvarūpeṇa pratipattau na tadātmajñānam, anyajñānameva bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4899: idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā'iti śabdasamarpitarūpasya tasya jñānaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4902: jñānaṃ yadi ca dṛṣṭārthaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭata eva tat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4907: na rūpasiddhaye tāvadyataḥ kartavyatā vidheḥ // MBs_2.176 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4911: tadupāye tvavijñāte vidhinā sa pravartyatām // MBs_2.178 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4914: yadi ca jñānasya dṛṣṭaṃ phalam, tata eva pravṛttisiddhe vyartho vidhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4915: yo hyātmarūpamanubhavitukāmaḥ, sa tasya jñāne svayameva yatate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4916: yastu na tathā, tasya tadvyarthamiti vidhiśatenāpi sa na pravartyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4917: athopāyājñānāddṛṣṭaphale 'pi na pravartate svayam, ato vidhīyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4919: yataḥ sa evopāyo vidhīyatām, yatrāyamajñānānna pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4923: tatrāpi hi niyamādṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ taṇḍuleṣu tatpraṇāḍyā vā pradhānapūrvasiddhiradṛṣṭaiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4930: tatra na svarūpasiddhyartham, anuṣṭhānaphalo hi vidhirnānuṣṭhānāya, dṛṣṭārthatvādeva tatsiddheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4931: tasmādalaukike 'pahatapāpmādirūpa ātmatattve śabdātpratipanne tasya sākṣājjñānaṃ prati tadanubhavopāyatvātsvayameva puruṣasyābhimukhyaṃ bhavatīti vyarthaṃ tadvidhānam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4932: yathāścaryabhūte kasmiṃścidarthe āgamātpratipanne tasya sākṣātkaraṇe svayamevonmukhatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4934: tadevaṃ jñāne niyogānupapatterniyoge ca vasturūpāvagame prāmāṇyāyogādvyavasthitātmatattvapratipattimicchatā śabdānna tasya niyogānupraveśo 'bhyupagantavya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4945: iti ceto dhārayet'iti vivakṣitatvācchravaṇādanyadanucintanaṃ dhyānaṃ pratyayapravāho vidhīyate karmavadevāmṛtatvaphalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4951: tathā ca ‘vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta'ityātmatattvavijñānasya siddhatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4953: sākṣātkaraṇaphalaṃ hi tattadanucintanaṃ dṛṣṭārtham, na tato 'nyatphalamākāṅkṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4957: ‘sa kratuṃ kurvīta'; iti tu na sakalaviśeṣātigātmatattvānucintanaṃ vidhīyate tadbhāvaphalam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4969: anyathā na evaśabdasya phalam, na ca nivartyaṃ vijñāyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4985: ‘aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi'iti bhūta eva paryavasitaṃ vākyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4992: tattu samanvayāt'iti codanālakṣaṇāddharmāttuśabdena viśeṣyaṃ brahma samanvayagamyamuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4993: samanvayo hi padārthānāṃ saṃsargo viniyogastato brahma gamyate, na codanāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4999: tatrānantaraṃ prāmāṇyapratipādanaṃ na yujyeta, ‘vṛttaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇam'; iti ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5001: sā copariṣṭādeva nirasiṣyate bahu cātra vaktavyamityalaṃ prasaṅgena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5008: evaṃ tāvatpratipattikartavyatāprāmāṇyavyājena yairaprāmāṇyamuktaṃ tatpratibodhanāya kṛtaḥ prayatnaḥ;
GSP33mbrahsiu:5013: na tāvadbrahmāntaryāmyādipadaṃ pramāṇam, saṃbandhajñānāpekṣayā pūrvasiddhe pratyayahetutvena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5014: nāpi vākyam; na hi tatsākṣādvācakam; padārthadvārā tu tat pratipattiḥ; apadārthe jñānasyābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5016: tatra padārtha eva viśiṣṭo vākyārtho bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5017: na cānadhigateṣu pramāṇāntareṇa padārthatvam; sambandhajñānāpekṣaṇāt ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5018: tatrāpadārthatve na vākyaviṣayatvam; anavabodhakaṃ teṣāṃ vākyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5020: tatrātyantāparidṛṣṭabrahmādyarthapramāṇābhimateṣu vākyeṣu tadvācīni padāni syuḥ, na vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5021: yadi na santi na ta itaraiḥ saṃsṛjyeran na bhidyeranniti na teṣāṃ prameyāḥ loṣṭādivat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5023: tathāpi tairadhigatasaṃbandhairna pratipādyeran apratipannāśca na viśiṣṭavākyārthapratipattihetavaḥ;
GSP33mbrahsiu:5037: sarvasyaiva hi vākyasyānadhigato viśeṣa eva prameyaḥ tathā kāraṇasāmānyaṃ vā satsāmānyaṃ vā ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:5052: iti pratipādanāt, ‘vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam'; iti dṛṣṭāntāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5054: tatra prapañcapadārtho 'pi siddhaḥ, niṣedho 'pi siddhaḥ, tayoḥ saṃsargāttadabhāvapratipattiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5060: yat khalu vākyaṃ na puruṣaṃ kvaciddhitasādhane pravartayati ahitasādhanācca [KKS_158] nivartayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5066: (anena ślokārdhenātra bhavitavyamityabhyūhaḥ; paraṃ tu mātṛkāsu na dṛśyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5068: api cājñānataḥ śokī duḥkhī jīvaḥ prakāśate // MBs_4.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5073: na ca pravṛttiniṣṭhatvaṃ tathāsmin kena vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5074: jñeyasya puruṣārthatvaṃ tatra cedatra tatsamam // MBs_4.9 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5080: na khalu hitopādānāhitahāne eva pramāṇaphale; upekṣāmapi hi pramāṇaphalaṃ pramāṇavida ācakṣate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5081: na ca puruṣārthatā pramāṇalakṣaṇam, pramāhetutvaṃ tu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5088: yadyapi ca saṃskārāttasyānuvṛttistathāpi śābdajñānamanusaṃtanvato viduṣo na pūrvavadbhavati nivartate cātyantāya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5089: dṛṣṭā ca jñānotpattereva puruṣārthatā kvacit kutūhalākulitānāmajñāte'rthe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5096: pratyakṣādijñeyaṃ hi siddhaṃ vastu puruṣārthaḥ salilādiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5098: atrāpi ca śabdaprameyaṃ svayameva brahma puruṣārtho jarādivividhāśivopaśamāt paramānandaprakāśatvācca suprasannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5102: tattve tādātmyajñāne ca tathābhāvāt viśvāśivopaśamāt paramaśivabhāvācca paripūrṇaḥ puruṣārtho āpto bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5106: īdṛśaṃ pravṛtyaṅgatvamatrāpyastyeva, śabdāt pramite brahmaṇi sākṣātkaraṇāya pravṛtteriṣṭatvāditi //
